analyzed: don dam bsnyen par yang gsungs pa // shing las me dang zla ba chu shel las ni chu yang ce //
translated: The ultimate approximation is also stated:🔽Fire from wood, water from the moon crystal,

original: zho las mar dang rdo ba rnams las lcags rigs rnams //
analyzed: zho las mar dang rdo ba rnams las lcags rigs rnams //
translated: butter from curd, and iron from stones.

original: bud med skye gnas 'grogs las ma nyams bde ba ni //
analyzed: bud med skye gnas 'grogs las ma nyams bde ba ni //
translated: The bliss of the woman who is not lost to the experience of her sexual organ,

original: de thabs sbyor bas skal ldan rnams kyis gzung bar mdzod //
analyzed: de thabs sbyor bas skal ldan rnams kyis gzung bar mdzod //
translated: that is to be grasped by the fortunate ones through the application of the method.

original: khyod kyi sems la bsal bar bya dang gzhag bya ba //
analyzed: khyod kyi sems la bsal bar bya dang gzhag bya ba //
translated: In your mind there is nothing to be removed and nothing to be added;

original: cung zad med cing 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang med //
analyzed: cung zad med cing 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang med //
translated: there is no diminution and no increase.

original: sems la rang gi sems ni khams gsum pa nyid du //
analyzed: sems la rang gi sems ni khams gsum pa nyid du //
translated: In the mind, the mind itself is only a manifestation of the three realms,

original: se sor snang ba tsam ste chur son nyi ma bzhin ;🔽/ zhes so //
analyzed: se sor snang ba tsam ste chur son nyi ma bzhin ; / zhes so //
translated: like the sun reflected in water.

original: sems gcig tu kho na shes rab kyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa du ma'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sems gcig tu kho na shes rab kyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa du ma'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that the mind is only one, but it becomes manifold in the form of the reflections of wisdom.

original: 'di nyid ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: To teach just this, he says,

original: du ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: du ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Smoke, etc. ,”

original: du ba kho na mtshan gang gi dang po yin pa de yi ste /
analyzed: du ba kho na mtshan gang gi dang po yin pa de yi ste /
translated: where “smoke” is the first of the signs.

original: mchan ma ni yid ches par byed pa ste /
analyzed: mchan ma ni yid ches par byed pa ste /
translated: A “sign” is a means of conviction.

original: gang gis mngon par 'dod pa gsal bar bya ba de zhes so //
analyzed: gang gis mngon par 'dod pa gsal bar bya ba de zhes so //
translated: It is that by which the desired object is made clear.

original: srog rtsol ni bum ba can te steng dang 'og gi rtsa gsum 'gog pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: srog rtsol ni bum ba can te steng dang 'og gi rtsa gsum 'gog pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: “Prāṇāyāma” is vase-breathing, which has the nature of blocking the three upper and lower channels.

original: dbu mar 'bab pa ste sems kyi rtsar srog gi rlung 'bab cing rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: dbu mar 'bab pa ste sems kyi rtsar srog gi rlung 'bab cing rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: It flows in the central channel, the life-force wind flows in the channel of the mind and engages in it.

original: rig ma gtso bo'i brtul zhugs ni tshangs par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: rig ma gtso bo'i brtul zhugs ni tshangs par spyod pa ste /
translated: The vow of the main consort is celibacy.

original: rig ma ni rang gi rgyal ba'i dbang bskur zhing yon tan lhag pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: rig ma ni rang gi rgyal ba'i dbang bskur zhing yon tan lhag pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The consort is one who has been empowered as a queen, who is superior in good qualities, and who is taken.

original: mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
translated: In the Guru-vidya-tantra it is said:

original: pukka s'i ni mchog mdzes ma //
analyzed: pukka s'i ni mchog mdzes ma //
translated: The supreme beauty is PukkasI,

original: gzugs dang lang tshogs brgyan byas ma //
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tshogs brgyan byas ma //
translated: Adorned with form and youth,

original: gcig tu rnal 'byor goms byas ma //
analyzed: gcig tu rnal 'byor goms byas ma //
translated: Practiced in yoga alone,

original: dam tshig shes shing brtul shugs brtan //🔽brtan ma chags med ngo tsha med ;
analyzed: dam tshig shes shing brtul shugs brtan // brtan ma chags med ngo tsha med ;
translated: Knowing the vow, firm in the vow,🔽 Steadfast, shameless,🔽Free from craving, free from pride,

original: / sred bral nga rgyal med thob nas //
analyzed: / sred bral nga rgyal med thob nas //
translated: The one who has attained,

original: de dang lhan cig sngags rig pa //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig sngags rig pa //
translated: Together with her, the one who knows the mantra,

original: rang gi rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyad //🔽ces so // de las rdo rje ma ltung ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyad // ces so // de las rdo rje ma ltung ba ste /
translated: Should practice the vow of one's own consort.🔽From that, the vajra does not fall.

original: rdo rje ma lhung ba ni nges pa nyid de des so //
analyzed: rdo rje ma lhung ba ni nges pa nyid de des so //
translated: The vajra does not fall, it is certain, by that.

original: steng du khu bas zhes pa nor bu dang padma las gyen du 'gro bas dbral bar son pas so //🔽lam 'di yis ni steng du ba la sogs pa yan lag drug gi mtshan nyid can gyis so //
analyzed: steng du khu bas zhes pa nor bu dang padma las gyen du 'gro bas dbral bar son pas so // lam 'di yis ni steng du ba la sogs pa yan lag drug gi mtshan nyid can gyis so //
translated: The semen above is the upward movement from the jewel and lotus, and it reaches the forehead.

original: rnal 'byor ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te 'di la yod pas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te 'di la yod pas so //
translated: By this path, above, which is the characteristic of the six branches beginning with exhalation, the yoga is the yoga of the completion stage, and he who possesses it is so called.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni dbang po'i ma yin pa ste /🔽mchog tu'o 'gyur ba med pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni dbang po'i ma yin pa ste / mchog tu'o 'gyur ba med pa ni /
translated: The bliss of all buddhas is the supreme, non-emission of the sense organs.🔽The unmoving is the supreme, non-emission.

original: mngon par sgrub pa'am ste mchog tu mi @309b 'gyur pa //🔽zhes pa mngon par sgrub par byed ba ste /
analyzed: mngon par sgrub pa'am ste mchog tu mi @309b 'gyur pa // zhes pa mngon par sgrub par byed ba ste /
translated: It is accomplished, or supreme, non-emission.

original: gang gis kun nas rdzogs par byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis kun nas rdzogs par byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: It is accomplished by which it is completely perfected.

original: pho nya kun gyi lhan cig skyes pa 'thob ste rtsa steng phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gags pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi stong ba ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod cing srid pa gsum spangs pa'i gzhom du med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: pho nya kun gyi lhan cig skyes pa 'thob ste rtsa steng phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gags pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi stong ba ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod cing srid pa gsum spangs pa'i gzhom du med pa yin gyi /
translated: The innate of all messengers is attained, and the emptiness of the ḍākinīs, whose nature is the cessation of the seventy-two thousand nāḍīs, is called innate and is the indestructibility that abandons the three existences.

original: 'jig rten la grags pa'i bzhi ba'i sgrib pa'i dag nyid kyi lhan cig skyes ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa'i bzhi ba'i sgrib pa'i dag nyid kyi lhan cig skyes ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The innate purity of the obscurations, which is renowned in the world, is not [the innate purity of the fourth stage].

original: stong pa ni gcig nyid du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: stong pa ni gcig nyid du brjod par bya ste /
translated: Emptiness is to be expressed as one,

original: sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'am gyi sgra'i don to //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'am gyi sgra'i don to //
translated: because it is free from all obscurations. This is the meaning of the word “or.”

original: 'od na de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni de kho na nyid dang de kho na nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa yin zhing gzhan ma yin no zhes bshad la /
analyzed: 'od na de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni de kho na nyid dang de kho na nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa yin zhing gzhan ma yin no zhes bshad la /
translated: Thus, the yoga of the completion stage is reality and the means of accomplishing reality, and nothing else.

original: de'i phyir de nyid 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid 'gyur mod /
translated: Therefore, that alone is sufficient.

original: nye bar mi mkho ba gzhan gyis ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: nye bar mi mkho ba gzhan gyis ci bya zhe na /
translated: What is the use of other things that are not necessary?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Form, etc.”

original: 'jig rten ni khams gsum pa ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten ni khams gsum pa ste //
translated: The world is the three realms.

original: de la yod pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid do /
analyzed: de la yod pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid do /
translated: That which exists in that [world] is mundane.

original: nge yang 'di yin la dngos grub kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nge yang 'di yin la dngos grub kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: That is also this, and it is also power.

original: dngos grub ni 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i dbang phyug nyid de 'grub bo //
analyzed: dngos grub ni 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i dbang phyug nyid de 'grub bo //
translated: Power is the accomplishment of sovereignty up to the end of existence in Akaniṣṭha.

original: gzugs la sogs ba'i rtog pa zhes pa gzugs su yod cing gnod par bya'o zhes pa gzugs te de kho na gang gi dang po yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs ba'i rtog pa zhes pa gzugs su yod cing gnod par bya'o zhes pa gzugs te de kho na gang gi dang po yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase “concepts of form, etc.” means that form is that which is present as form and is to be harmed.

original: de'i rtog pa ni yid kyi las so zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rtog pa ni yid kyi las so zhes pa ste /
translated: The concept of that is mental action.

original: de la gzugs bsgom pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de la gzugs bsgom pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The cultivation of form there is the action seal.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni ye shes te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni ye shes te /
translated: The word “etc.” refers to gnosis.

original: de sgom pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de sgom pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The cultivation of that is the gnosis seal.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la sogs pa /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la sogs pa /
translated: The cultivation of the maṇḍala wheel, etc.

original: sgom pa goms pa yis zhes pa la dkyil ni rten gyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: sgom pa goms pa yis zhes pa la dkyil ni rten gyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The maṇḍala is characterized by the support.

original: 'khor lo ni lha'i tshogs pa brten pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni lha'i tshogs pa brten pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The wheel is characterized by the assembly of deities that is supported.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni sngags dang phyag rgya dang gdan la sogs pa'o //🔽de rnams kyi gom pa ni mngon du phyogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni sngags dang phyag rgya dang gdan la sogs pa'o // de rnams kyi gom pa ni mngon du phyogs par byed pa ste /
translated: The word “etc.” refers to the mantras, seals, seats, and so on.

original: de sgom pa ni yang yang du mngon par zhen pa yin zhing de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de sgom pa ni yang yang du mngon par zhen pa yin zhing de rnams kyis so //
translated: The cultivation of those is the repeated adherence to them.

original: gal te da ltan lam 'di kho nas thams cad dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur mod //
analyzed: gal te da ltan lam 'di kho nas thams cad dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur mod //
translated: If one were to say, “Now, all powers are accomplished by this path alone,

original: du ba la sogs pa'i lam gyi man ngag gi dgos pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i lam gyi man ngag gi dgos pa med do zhe na /
translated: so there is no need for the purpose of the instructions on the path of smoke and so on,”

original: gsungs pa / ga la zhes so //
analyzed: gsungs pa / ga la zhes so //
translated: [in response to that] it is said, “How?”

original: che na po yang 'di yin la dngos grub kyang ngo zhes pa dngos grub chen po ste phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: che na po yang 'di yin la dngos grub kyang ngo zhes pa dngos grub chen po ste phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
translated: It is great, and it is also a power, so it is a great power, the power of the great seal.

original: 'dod pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa @310a * //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa @310a * //
translated: It is desired, and it is supramundane.

original: pa'o ; / gang la 'grub ste du ba la sogs pa'i man ngag ces par cis 'grub ste /
analyzed: pa'o ; / gang la 'grub ste du ba la sogs pa'i man ngag ces par cis 'grub ste /
translated: On what is it accomplished? On the instructions of smoke and so on. How is it accomplished? It is not at all.

original: ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: That is the meaning.

original: 'o na lam gyi nye bar bstan pa 'dis ci yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par brtson pa'i blo can thams cad kyi thams cad las 'gyur ram ;
analyzed: 'o na lam gyi nye bar bstan pa 'dis ci yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par brtson pa'i blo can thams cad kyi thams cad las 'gyur ram ;
translated: Well then, by this instruction on the path, does the attainment of perfect buddhahood come from all for all who strive?

original: 'o na te dag par 'gro ba'i don byed pa la mkhas pa la spro ba 'ga' zhig kho na rnams kyi 'ga' zhig kho na las yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na te dag par 'gro ba'i don byed pa la mkhas pa la spro ba 'ga' zhig kho na rnams kyi 'ga' zhig kho na las yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: But if it is the case that the meaning of purification is the skillful performance of benefit, then it is the case that the enthusiasm of some is from some.🔽It is said:

original: lam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The path, etc.

original: bla ma dam pa ni dpal ldan bla ma ste /
analyzed: bla ma dam pa ni dpal ldan bla ma ste /
translated: The excellent guru is the glorious guru.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni don dam bsnyen par rgyas par gsungs pa ji skad du /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni don dam bsnyen par rgyas par gsungs pa ji skad du /
translated: His definition is extensively stated in the Guhyasamaja:

original: bsam ldan srid pa'i bsam gtan nyams pa la chags pa //
analyzed: bsam ldan srid pa'i bsam gtan nyams pa la chags pa //
translated: The one with thought, who is attached to the loss of the meditative stabilization of existence,

original: 'dod ldan 'dod pa chen po la ni thugs brel pa //
analyzed: 'dod ldan 'dod pa chen po la ni thugs brel pa //
translated: the one with desire, who is busy with great desire,

original: brtul zhugs che ldan dbang po gnyis kyi sde sbyor la //
analyzed: brtul zhugs che ldan dbang po gnyis kyi sde sbyor la //
translated: the one with great discipline, who is joined with the army of the two organs,

original: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la'ang 'dod chags ma nyams pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la'ang 'dod chags ma nyams pa //
translated: the one with the seal, who is not lost in desire even when going to the consort,

original: zla ba nyid ma'i lam ni rab nyams rnal 'byor can //
analyzed: zla ba nyid ma'i lam ni rab nyams rnal 'byor can //
translated: the one on the path of the moon and mother, who is lost in yoga,

original: shes rab me la rnal 'byor stobs las rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: shes rab me la rnal 'byor stobs las rab tu zhugs //
translated: the one who is engaged by the power of yoga in the fire of wisdom,

original: mtha' yas bde ba nyid kyis bdud rtsi thob 'gyur ba //
analyzed: mtha' yas bde ba nyid kyis bdud rtsi thob 'gyur ba //
translated: the one who has attained nectar by means of infinite bliss.

original: dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig 'joms de'i zhes rgyas par ro //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig 'joms de'i zhes rgyas par ro //
translated: The glorious guru, the vajra holder, is the one who destroys evil.

original: de'i bka' drin ni de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gis rjes su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bka' drin ni de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gis rjes su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: His kindness is to take care of you with the instructions on reality.

original: de las 'byung ste skye'o //
analyzed: de las 'byung ste skye'o //
translated: From him, it arises, it is born.

original: su rnams kyis she na /
analyzed: su rnams kyis she na /
translated: By which ones?

original: slob ma dag pa rnams kyis te dag pa ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams kyis tha mal ba'i nga rgyal gyi dri ma sbangs pa rnams so //
analyzed: slob ma dag pa rnams kyis te dag pa ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams kyis tha mal ba'i nga rgyal gyi dri ma sbangs pa rnams so //
translated: By the pure disciples, the pure ones being those whose stains of ordinary pride have been removed by the empowerments and so forth.

original: slob ma de rnams ni gzhan gyi don byed pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rjes su bstan par bya ba yang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma de rnams ni gzhan gyi don byed pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rjes su bstan par bya ba yang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: Those disciples are also to be instructed by the others, such as those who perform benefit for others.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler gsungs pa /🔽ji ltar dug ni sngags sogs kyis //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler gsungs pa / ji ltar dug ni sngags sogs kyis //
translated: It is said in the Drop of the Great Seal:🔽Just as poison is purified by a mantra and so forth,

original: sbyangs bzhin pa ni bcud len te //🔽de bzhin dbang bskur la sogs kyis //
analyzed: sbyangs bzhin pa ni bcud len te // de bzhin dbang bskur la sogs kyis //
translated: and just as a mercury elixir is purified,🔽in the same way, the impure disciple becomes pure

original: slob ma ma dag dag ldan 'gyur //
analyzed: slob ma ma dag dag ldan 'gyur //
translated: by the empowerments and so forth.

original: zhes so // gang rnams gzhan gyi bya ba dge la brtson pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // gang rnams gzhan gyi bya ba dge la brtson pa ste /
translated: Those who are diligent in virtuous actions for others

original: dge ba de la spro ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba de la spro ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: That is the delight in virtue.

original: da ni lam thob pa rnams kyi bag med pa rnams kyis lam 'phrog pa'i rgyu mtshan gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni lam thob pa rnams kyi bag med pa rnams kyis lam 'phrog pa'i rgyu mtshan gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the reason for the taking away of the path by the heedlessness of those who have obtained the path is stated:

original: gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Other, etc.

original: sangs rgyas nyid gang gis bde ba tshol zhing don du gnyer bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid gang gis bde ba tshol zhing don du gnyer bar byed pa ste /
translated: That Buddhahood is the seeking and striving for happiness.

original: de ma thag tu brjod pa 'di ni dga' ba rgyas par byed do zhes pas rin chen te yid @310b bzhin gyi rin po che dang 'dra bas rin po che ste /
analyzed: de ma thag tu brjod pa 'di ni dga' ba rgyas par byed do zhes pas rin chen te yid @310b bzhin gyi rin po che dang 'dra bas rin po che ste /
translated: This just mentioned is the expanding of delight, thus it is the jewel, like a wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: rnyed dka' ba nyid kyi phyir dang bsams pa'i don gyi 'bras bu ster ba nyid kyi phyir na lam bzangs rin chen no //
analyzed: rnyed dka' ba nyid kyi phyir dang bsams pa'i don gyi 'bras bu ster ba nyid kyi phyir na lam bzangs rin chen no //
translated: The good path is the jewel because of its rarity and because of its bestowal of the fruit of the intended aim.

original: phyi nas khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nas khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
translated: The summary of the special qualities follows.

original: bag med ni bag med pa'i spyod pa can te /
analyzed: bag med ni bag med pa'i spyod pa can te /
translated: Heedless is one who is heedless in conduct.

original: phan pa bde ba la ltos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phan pa bde ba la ltos pa med pa'o //
translated: He is without regard for benefit and happiness.

original: 'gro ba drug po rnams su nyams par 'gyur bas na sems can no //
analyzed: 'gro ba drug po rnams su nyams par 'gyur bas na sems can no //
translated: He is a sentient being because of his degeneration in the six transmigrations.

original: gzhan pa ni gang snying rje la sogs pa'i yon tan dang bral ba pha rol la phan pa dang bde ba la mi brtson pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan pa ni gang snying rje la sogs pa'i yon tan dang bral ba pha rol la phan pa dang bde ba la mi brtson pa'o //
translated: The other is one who is devoid of the virtues of compassion, etc., and who is not intent on the welfare and happiness of others.

original: rang gi khyim ni chung ma'o //
analyzed: rang gi khyim ni chung ma'o //
translated: One's own home is one's wife.

original: de kho na dgon pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na dgon pa ste /
translated: That is the wilderness,

original: gdug pa'i sems can gyi gnas te zhugs pa de'o //
analyzed: gdug pa'i sems can gyi gnas te zhugs pa de'o //
translated: the abode of wild beasts, and one enters it.

original: 'di rnams su dbang po rnams 'ching ngo zhes pa yul rnams te /
analyzed: 'di rnams su dbang po rnams 'ching ngo zhes pa yul rnams te /
translated: In these, the faculties are bound refers to the objects,

original: gzugs la sogs pas phyi rol gyi longs spyod rnams so //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pas phyi rol gyi longs spyod rnams so //
translated: the external enjoyments of form, etc.

original: de rnams kyang ngan pa ste ro bro ba chung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam par smin pa rtsub pa nyid kyi phyir dbang brgyal ba'i sems kyis bsten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang ngan pa ste ro bro ba chung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam par smin pa rtsub pa nyid kyi phyir dbang brgyal ba'i sems kyis bsten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: They are also bad, because they are of little flavor, because their maturation is harsh, and because they are enjoyed by a mind that is intoxicated with the faculties.

original: de rnams kho na chom rkun pa rnams te byin pa'i lam bzang po'i rin po che yang de rnams kyis 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: de rnams kho na chom rkun pa rnams te byin pa'i lam bzang po'i rin po che yang de rnams kyis 'phrog par byed //
translated: They are thieves, because they steal the jewel of the good path of giving.

original: rku bar byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rku bar byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: They steal, that is to say.

original: 'di rnams 'ba' zhig gis lam bzang po rin po che'i nor khyim gyi dgon par zhugs ba 'phrog pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / gnyen 'dun 'thib po'i nang du zhugs pa'i the tshom la sogs pa'i rkun po rnams kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'di rnams 'ba' zhig gis lam bzang po rin po che'i nor khyim gyi dgon par zhugs ba 'phrog pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / gnyen 'dun 'thib po'i nang du zhugs pa'i the tshom la sogs pa'i rkun po rnams kyis kyang ngo //
translated: Not only do these alone steal the jewel of the good path from the monastery of the house, but also the thieves of doubt, etc., which enter into the thickets of relatives.

original: gnyen 'dun ni chung ma dang bu dang bu'i bu la sogs pa grags pa'o /
analyzed: gnyen 'dun ni chung ma dang bu dang bu'i bu la sogs pa grags pa'o /
translated: Relatives are the wife, son, grandson, etc., who are well known.

original: thib po ni nags so //
analyzed: thib po ni nags so //
translated: Thickets are forests.

original: yid ches pa rnams gsum gyis nges pa'i lam bzang po'i rin po che la yang so ma nyi za ba ni the tshom ste /
analyzed: yid ches pa rnams gsum gyis nges pa'i lam bzang po'i rin po che la yang so ma nyi za ba ni the tshom ste /
translated: Doubt also steals the jewel of the good path of certainty, by the three kinds of confidence.

original: ci ste 'di lam bzang po yin nam 'o na te ma yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste 'di lam bzang po yin nam 'o na te ma yin zhes pa'o //
translated: It is like this: Is this the good path or not?

original: 'gyod pa ni las ngan pa bdag gis byas te /
analyzed: 'gyod pa ni las ngan pa bdag gis byas te /
translated: Regret is like this: I have done bad actions.

original: de'i phyir bdag gis lam mngon du mi bya'o zhes pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa can no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag gis lam mngon du mi bya'o zhes pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa can no //
translated: Therefore I will not make progress on the path.

original: gnyid ni gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: gnyid ni gnyis pa ste /
translated: Sleep is the second.

original: lus dang yid dag las su mi rung ba nyid du skyed par byed pa rmugs pa zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: lus dang yid dag las su mi rung ba nyid du skyed par byed pa rmugs pa zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: and it produces unserviceability in the body and mind.

original: le lo ni spro ba zhan pa'o //
analyzed: le lo ni spro ba zhan pa'o //
translated: Laziness is lack of enthusiasm.

original: rgod pa ni sems rnam par g-yengs pa nyid de /
analyzed: rgod pa ni sems rnam par g-yengs pa nyid de /
translated: Excitement is the distraction of the mind.

original: grong khyer la sogs su 'khyam ba zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: grong khyer la sogs su 'khyam ba zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: It is the wandering of the mind in the village, etc.

original: de ltar 'di rnams ni lam bsgom pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma rnams su @311a * //
analyzed: de ltar 'di rnams ni lam bsgom pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma rnams su @311a * //
translated: Thus, these are the stains of samadhi for those who cultivate the path.

original: 'phags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yis bshad do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yis bshad do zhes pa'o //
translated: They are explained by this verse of the Aryas.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma 'di rnams kyis 'phrog ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma 'di rnams kyis 'phrog ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only are these stains of samadhi thieves,

original: srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ste /
analyzed: srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ste /
translated: but also killing, etc.

original: rin po che zhes pa ni lam bzang po'i rin po che'o //
analyzed: rin po che zhes pa ni lam bzang po'i rin po che'o //
translated: The jewel is the jewel of the good path.

original: rta gtu ni dus gsum du'o //
analyzed: rta gtu ni dus gsum du'o //
translated: The horse is the three times.

original: srog gcod pa sems can gsod pa'o //
analyzed: srog gcod pa sems can gsod pa'o //
translated: Killing is the killing of a living being.

original: brdzun zhes pa mi bden pa smra ba'o //
analyzed: brdzun zhes pa mi bden pa smra ba'o //
translated: Lying is speaking untruth.

original: ma byin pa zhes pa gzhan gyi rdzas rku ba'o //
analyzed: ma byin pa zhes pa gzhan gyi rdzas rku ba'o //
translated: Stealing is taking the property of another without his consent.

original: gzhan gyi bud med ces pa ni 'dod pa log par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bud med ces pa ni 'dod pa log par spyod pa'o //
translated: Sexual misconduct is to have intercourse with the wives of others.

original: tshig rtsub ni pha rol po'i zhe 'gegs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshig rtsub ni pha rol po'i zhe 'gegs par byed pa'o //
translated: Harsh speech is to cause others to feel pain.

original: phra ma smra ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis pha rol 'byed pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: phra ma smra ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis pha rol 'byed pa'i tshig go //
translated: Frivolous speech is to speak words that divide others, with an afflicted mind.

original: tshig 'khyal pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pas nye bar bcom pa'i ha ha hi hi zhes pa la sogs 'dod chags bskyed pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: tshig 'khyal pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pas nye bar bcom pa'i ha ha hi hi zhes pa la sogs 'dod chags bskyed pa'i tshig go //
translated: Idle talk is to speak words that arouse desire, such as “ha ha” and “hi hi,” overwhelmed by desire and so on.

original: brnab sems ni gzhan gyi rdzas la log par chags pa'o //
analyzed: brnab sems ni gzhan gyi rdzas la log par chags pa'o //
translated: Covetousness is to be wrongly attached to the wealth of others.

original: gnod sems ni gnod par byed pa'i sems nyid do //
analyzed: gnod sems ni gnod par byed pa'i sems nyid do //
translated: Malice is to have a mind that wishes to harm.

original: lta ba ngan pa ni med pa'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa ni med pa'i lta ba'o //
translated: Wrong views are views of nonexistence.

original: de bzhin du yod pa'i sdig pa lnga ni 'tshe ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yod pa'i sdig pa lnga ni 'tshe ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the five existing sins are violence and so on.

original: nye ba'i sdig pa lnga ni cho lo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i sdig pa lnga ni cho lo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five minor sins are gambling and so on.

original: gsod ces pa ba lang la sogs pa gsod pa lnga'o //
analyzed: gsod ces pa ba lang la sogs pa gsod pa lnga'o //
translated: “ Killing” is the five killings of cows and so on.

original: 'khu zhes pa grogs po la sogs pa la 'khu ba lnga'o //
analyzed: 'khu zhes pa grogs po la sogs pa la 'khu ba lnga'o //
translated: “ Treachery” is the five treacheries to friends and so on.

original: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po kun nas chags pa lnga'o zhes pa 'di'i tshang lnga yin pas lnga pa rnam lnga ste chom rkun pa de rnams kho na'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po kun nas chags pa lnga'o zhes pa 'di'i tshang lnga yin pas lnga pa rnam lnga ste chom rkun pa de rnams kho na'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, the five are the five of the five attachments.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:🔽Abandon harm, untruth, another’s wife,

original: 'tshe dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spongs shig gzhan gyi nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: 'tshe dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spongs shig gzhan gyi nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid //
translated: another’s wealth, and drinking alcohol.🔽These five sins are the vajra fetters in cyclic existence,

original: 'khor bar rdo rje zhags pa yin te rang gi dge ba mthar byed sdig pa lnga po 'di rnams so //
analyzed: 'khor bar rdo rje zhags pa yin te rang gi dge ba mthar byed sdig pa lnga po 'di rnams so //
translated: which destroy one’s virtue.🔽Do not play dice, eat forbidden food,

original: cho lo kha na ma tho ba cas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos //
analyzed: cho lo kha na ma tho ba cas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos //
translated: read bad books, or worship spirits and demigods.🔽Do not kill cows, children, women, men,

original: ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o //
translated: or the gurus of gods and humans.🔽Do not betray friends, masters,

original: grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang ;
analyzed: grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang ;
translated: gods, human gurus, or the saṅgha.

original: / dbang po rnams ni kun nas chags pa'o zhes pa mi'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs rnams ni nyi shu lnga //
analyzed: / dbang po rnams ni kun nas chags pa'o zhes pa mi'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs rnams ni nyi shu lnga //
translated: The senses are completely attached. The observances of the lord of men are twenty-five.

original: zhes so // sdig pa can gyi las zhes bya ba bar du gcod par byed pas te /
analyzed: zhes so // sdig pa can gyi las zhes bya ba bar du gcod par byed pas te /
translated: The so-called sinful actions are the obstacles.

original: mtshams med pa lnga po byed pa rnams kyang bsdus pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga po byed pa rnams kyang bsdus pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The five acts of immediate retribution are also included.

original: 'di rnams kyis lam bzang po'i rin @311b po che 'phrog pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis lam bzang po'i rin @311b po che 'phrog pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only do these steal the jewel of the good path,

original: shin tu bza' dang btung ba rnams kyis dang sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod rnams kyis kyang zhes pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu bza' dang btung ba rnams kyis dang sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod rnams kyis kyang zhes pa'o //
translated: but also with very much food and drink and with various enjoyments.

original: bza' ba ni shin tu sha la sogs pa za ba'o //
analyzed: bza' ba ni shin tu sha la sogs pa za ba'o //
translated: Food is eating very much meat and so forth.

original: btung ba ni chang 'thung ba la sogs par grags pa'o //
analyzed: btung ba ni chang 'thung ba la sogs par grags pa'o //
translated: Drink is drinking alcohol and so forth.

original: shin tu ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i chos kyis so //
analyzed: shin tu ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i chos kyis so //
translated: Very much is by the dharma of fainting and so forth.

original: longs spyod par bya bas na longs spyod de me tog phreng ba dang tsandan dang bud med dang mal stan la sogs pa ste sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba'o //
analyzed: longs spyod par bya bas na longs spyod de me tog phreng ba dang tsandan dang bud med dang mal stan la sogs pa ste sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba'o //
translated: Enjoyment is that which is enjoyed, such as garlands, sandalwood, women, beds, seats, and so on, which are various and colorful.

original: brtson 'grus ldan pa la yang ste lam bsgom pa la spro pa'i'o //🔽brjod ma thag pa brtson 'grus brtan pa can 'ba' zhig gir ma zad kyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus ldan pa la yang ste lam bsgom pa la spro pa'i'o // brjod ma thag pa brtson 'grus brtan pa can 'ba' zhig gir ma zad kyi /
translated: It is for those who are diligent, who delight in cultivating the path.🔽The meaning of the word “also” is not only for those who are steadfast in diligence,

original: brtson 'grus brtan pa dang mi ldan pa'i yang ngo zhes pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtan pa dang mi ldan pa'i yang ngo zhes pa yang gi sgra'i don to //
translated: but also for those who are not steadfast in diligence.

original: bag med pa ni shin tu bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs ba dang mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa'o //
analyzed: bag med pa ni shin tu bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs ba dang mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa'o //
translated: Carelessness is excessive eating, drinking, and so on, and associating with nonvirtuous friends.

original: de las brgyal ba ste sems dang bral ba nyid du gyur pa la 'phrog par byed pa kho na'o zhes bya pa'o //
analyzed: de las brgyal ba ste sems dang bral ba nyid du gyur pa la 'phrog par byed pa kho na'o zhes bya pa'o //
translated: From that, one becomes intoxicated, loses one’s mind, and is carried away.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i srid pa'i longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba ni dge ba byed pa rnams kyi yang bar du gcod par byed pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i srid pa'i longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba ni dge ba byed pa rnams kyi yang bar du gcod par byed pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The delight in the enjoyments of the various existences is an obstacle even for those who do good.

original: 'o na de ltar lam rin po che yongs su rtog pa po la mngon par dgongs nas bar du gcod par byed pa'i skyon rnams rjod par byed pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: 'o na de ltar lam rin po che yongs su rtog pa po la mngon par dgongs nas bar du gcod par byed pa'i skyon rnams rjod par byed pa ma yin nam //
translated: But, in that case, is it not the case that the one who is intent on the path of the jewel is being told about the faults that are obstacles?

original: rang nyid lam gyi yongs su rtog pa po ma yin pa la brjod pa ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: rang nyid lam gyi yongs su rtog pa po ma yin pa la brjod pa ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is being said to the one who is not himself intent on the path?

original: gang phyir te gang gi phyir rang nyid rtog pa po min pa de'i phyir gzhan cig shos g-yon can khram pa chen po la ston te /
analyzed: gang phyir te gang gi phyir rang nyid rtog pa po min pa de'i phyir gzhan cig shos g-yon can khram pa chen po la ston te /
translated: Because he is not himself intent, he is being shown the other, the one who is deceitful, the great deceiver.

original: 'di rin po che rin thang chen po yin nam zhes shes pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: 'di rin po che rin thang chen po yin nam zhes shes pa'i ched du'o //
translated: For the purpose of knowing, Is this a jewel of great value?

original: des smras pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des smras pa ma yin no //
translated: He says, No!,

original: de nas de'i dag las te /
analyzed: de nas de'i dag las te /
translated: and then, from his words,

original: g-yon can gyi tshig las 'dor bar byed pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon can gyi tshig las 'dor bar byed pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
translated: he is to be rejected, only, from the words of the deceiver.

original: de bzhin kho nar shes rab 'chal ba'i rigs can ni sdig pa'i dregs pa'i tshig las lam bzang rin thang med par rin po che thob na yang gtong bar byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin kho nar shes rab 'chal ba'i rigs can ni sdig pa'i dregs pa'i tshig las lam bzang rin thang med par rin po che thob na yang gtong bar byed do //
translated: Likewise, those of a foolish type, from the words of the pride of sin, give up the good path, even when they have obtained the jewel without price.

original: de ltar lam rin po che yongs su rtog pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyis yang sdig pa'i grogs po dang nye bar 'grogs pa'i skyon gsungs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar lam rin po che yongs su rtog pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyis yang sdig pa'i grogs po dang nye bar 'grogs pa'i skyon gsungs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, those who seek the jewel of the path, should understand the fault of associating with sinful friends.

original: 'o na de ltar lam rin po che rnam par shes par byas na rang nyid yongs su rtog pa po ma yin pas ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de ltar lam rin po che rnam par shes par byas na rang nyid yongs su rtog pa po ma yin pas ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: Well, if one understands the jewel of the path in that way, since one is not the one who fully understands it, what should one do?

original: bden mod / de ni gal te gang rnams kyi @312a * //🔽skabs las rin chen chen po yongs su rtog par byed du gzhug pa de rnams kyi rnam dag ngag gis te /
analyzed: bden mod / de ni gal te gang rnams kyi @312a * // skabs las rin chen chen po yongs su rtog par byed du gzhug pa de rnams kyi rnam dag ngag gis te /
translated: True, but that is if one is to be made to fully understand the great jewel.🔽For those who are to be made to fully understand the great jewel, it is to be understood clearly by their pure speech,

original: mi slu ba'i tshig rnams kyis ni gsal par rnam par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mi slu ba'i tshig rnams kyis ni gsal par rnam par shes par bya ste /
translated: by their words that do not deceive.

original: rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di'o nges par bya'o //
analyzed: rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di'o nges par bya'o //
translated: This is the jewel of great value! one should be certain.

original: de ltar kho na rigs kyi bus lam rin po che thob pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig las 'di ni rin thang med pa'o zhes legs par yongs su brtags te shin tu brtan par byas nas lhag par rjes su 'brel par bya zhing dor bar mi bya'o
analyzed: de ltar kho na rigs kyi bus lam rin po che thob pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig las 'di ni rin thang med pa'o zhes legs par yongs su brtags te shin tu brtan par byas nas lhag par rjes su 'brel par bya zhing dor bar mi bya'o
translated: Thus, a son of noble family who has attained the precious path in this way, having well examined the words of the spiritual master, should make it very firm, and should not abandon it, thinking, “This is priceless.”

original: zhes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten ba ni rtag tu dge legs kyi ched du lam rin po che bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams kyi yang shin tu legs pa yin no zhes bshad do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten ba ni rtag tu dge legs kyi ched du lam rin po che bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams kyi yang shin tu legs pa yin no zhes bshad do zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is said that it is very good for those who are always striving to cultivate the precious path for the sake of virtue to rely on the spiritual master.

original: de ltar lam bsgom pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i yang bdud kyi las rnam par spangs pa med par sems brtan par gyur pa ma yin no zhes pa de'i phyir de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar lam bsgom pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i yang bdud kyi las rnam par spangs pa med par sems brtan par gyur pa ma yin no zhes pa de'i phyir de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, even for those who have set out to cultivate the path, if they do not abandon the works of Mara, their minds will not become firm. Therefore, in order to teach that, he says,

original: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Amṛtakuṇḍali and so forth.

original: bdud sdig can ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs rnams su sprul nas lam bsgom ba la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bgegs te bar du gcod par byed do //
analyzed: bdud sdig can ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs rnams su sprul nas lam bsgom ba la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bgegs te bar du gcod par byed do //
translated: The sinful demon, having emanated the forms of the Perfectly Awakened Ones, etc. , is an obstacle, an obstruction, to the Bodhisattva who is engaged in cultivating the path.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du ba'i lam ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du ba'i lam ma yin la /
translated: This is not the path for the sake of the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.🔽By which, through this path that you are following, no one has ever gone forth, will go forth, or is going forth.

original: gang gis khyod gnas pa'i lam 'dis 'ga' zhig kyang nges bar byung ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / nges par 'byung ba'ang ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa rig par bya ste zhes rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bdud kyi las kyi le'ur gsungs pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis khyod gnas pa'i lam 'dis 'ga' zhig kyang nges bar byung ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / nges par 'byung ba'ang ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa rig par bya ste zhes rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bdud kyi las kyi le'ur gsungs pa shes par bya'o //
translated: And so on. One should know this in detail from the chapter on the deeds of the demon in the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: de ltar bdud kyi las kyi skyon nye bar spangs nas thams cad nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar bdud kyi las kyi skyon nye bar spangs nas thams cad nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
translated: Having thus eliminated the faults of the deeds of the demon, he states the summary of all of them:

original: de phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: ni ste gang gi phyir lam 'phrog par byed pa 'di yod pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ni ste gang gi phyir lam 'phrog par byed pa 'di yod pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: ni, that is, because of the existence of this, the cause of the snatching of the path.

original: chom rkun rtsa lag ces pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: chom rkun rtsa lag ces pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: corruptor, etc.

original: the tshom la sogs pa yang yongs su btang ste 'bad pas te gus pa chen pos bla ma dam pas byin pa'i lam rin chen khyad par du 'phags pas legs par sba ba rab tu gsal ba ma yin par slob ma rnams kyis bya'o zhes pa thar pa
analyzed: the tshom la sogs pa yang yongs su btang ste 'bad pas te gus pa chen pos bla ma dam pas byin pa'i lam rin chen khyad par du 'phags pas legs par sba ba rab tu gsal ba ma yin par slob ma rnams kyis bya'o zhes pa thar pa
translated: Having given up doubt, etc., with great effort, i.e., with great respect, the disciples should guard the path given by the excellent guru, which is well hidden by the excellence of the jewel, and is not clearly manifest.

original: 'dod pa rnams kyi lam yongs @312b su srung ba gsungs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa rnams kyi lam yongs @312b su srung ba gsungs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is said, the path of those who desire liberation is guarded.

original: 'o na thar pa'i ched du lam gzhan yang yod pa ma yin nam des na 'di la gus pas ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na thar pa'i ched du lam gzhan yang yod pa ma yin nam des na 'di la gus pas ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: But, is there not another path for the sake of liberation? What is the use of respect for it? It is said:

original: dpa' bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the hero, etc.

original: dpa' bo'i rim pa ni phyi rol gyi drag po'i lha mchod ba dang dmigs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i rim pa ni phyi rol gyi drag po'i lha mchod ba dang dmigs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The hero's stage has the characteristic of the worship of the external fierce deities, visualization, etc.

original: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni sems kyis lha zhi pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni sems kyis lha zhi pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The stage of self-consecration is characterized by the mind's focus on the door of the yoga of the peaceful deity.

original: thar pa'i ched du sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag par bstan pa min zhes pa'o //
analyzed: thar pa'i ched du sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag par bstan pa min zhes pa'o //
translated: The Victorious Ones have not taught this for the sake of liberation.

original: bstan pa 'di ci zhig yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: bstan pa 'di ci zhig yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is this teaching?

original: shin tu rnam dag rim pa gcig bu zhes pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu rnam dag rim pa gcig bu zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said: The one stage of utter purity.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis med pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis med pa'o //
translated: It is the yoga of the completion stage, which is non-dual.

original: gal te 'di lta bu ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di lta bu ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, How is this known?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / gang gis zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / gang gis zhes pa'o //
translated: By whom?

original: rgyu gang zhig rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams kyis mtshams med pa lnga po byed pa rnams yang dag par gzung ba ste dbugs phyung par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu gang zhig rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams kyis mtshams med pa lnga po byed pa rnams yang dag par gzung ba ste dbugs phyung par gyur pa'o //
translated: By those who have committed the five heinous acts, the Victorious Ones have taken hold and given relief.

original: mtshams med pa lnga po rnams ni /
analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga po rnams ni /
translated: The five heinous acts are:

original: ma gsod pa dang / pha gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lang na sems kyis khrag 'byin pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ma gsod pa dang / pha gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lang na sems kyis khrag 'byin pa zhes pa ste /
translated: Killing one's mother, killing one's father, killing an arhat, causing a schism in the community, and with evil intent causing blood to come out of the body of a Tathagata.

original: lnga po rnams las gang yang rung ba'i skyon gyis bar mtshams med pa kho nar mnar med par bskal bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lnga po rnams las gang yang rung ba'i skyon gyis bar mtshams med pa kho nar mnar med par bskal bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: From among those five, one who has any of the faults will remain in the Avici hell for an eon, and only for an eon.

original: des na mtshams med par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: des na mtshams med par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they are called the heinous acts.

original: bde ba nyid kyis te thabs bde bas so //
analyzed: bde ba nyid kyis te thabs bde bas so //
translated: By means of bliss, that is, by means of the bliss of the method.

original: dbang bskur don gyi ni bzhi pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: dbang bskur don gyi ni bzhi pa'i don gyis so //
translated: By means of the empowerment, that is, by means of the fourth empowerment.

original: gzhan du na mtshams med pa lnga po byed pa rnams dpa' bo'i rim ba drag po'i las la chags pa dang bral ba dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa 'khor ba'i bde ba shin tu 'phel ba'i bag chags kyi rgyun can rnams kyis thar pa thob pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du na mtshams med pa lnga po byed pa rnams dpa' bo'i rim ba drag po'i las la chags pa dang bral ba dang / rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa 'khor ba'i bde ba shin tu 'phel ba'i bag chags kyi rgyun can rnams kyis thar pa thob pa ma yin te /
translated: Otherwise, those who have committed the five heinous acts, who are free from attachment to the fierce activities of the hero stage, and who have the continuum of the latent tendencies of the increase of the bliss of cyclic existence of the stage of self-consecration, do not attain liberation.

original: rgyu des zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu des zhes pa'o //
translated: For that reason, it is said.

original: 'o na gal te rim pa gnyis po 'di khyod rim pa ma yin par sems na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i don du gsungs she na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te rim pa gnyis po 'di khyod rim pa ma yin par sems na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i don du gsungs she na /
translated: Now, if you think that this two-fold process is not a process, then for what purpose did the Lord teach it?

original: gsungs pa / dpa' bo'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / dpa' bo'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: He says:🔽The process of the hero is not external,

original: ni ste gang gi phyir lus la srog zad pa la 'di gsungs pa de'i phyir dpa' bo'i rim pa phyi rol la ni min no //
analyzed: ni ste gang gi phyir lus la srog zad pa la 'di gsungs pa de'i phyir dpa' bo'i rim pa phyi rol la ni min no //
translated: since it is taught for the exhaustion of life in the body.

original: 'o na de ltar lus la rang byin gyis brlab pa gsal lam zhan ma @313a * //
analyzed: 'o na de ltar lus la rang byin gyis brlab pa gsal lam zhan ma @313a * //
translated: Now, is the self-consecration in the body clear or unclear?

original: yin te ; gang gi phyir rang gi sems byin gyis brlab pa so sor snang ba ste /
analyzed: yin te ; gang gi phyir rang gi sems byin gyis brlab pa so sor snang ba ste /
translated: It is not, because the self-consecration of one's mind is the appearance of the void.

original: de yang stong pa la khams gsum pa nyid mthong pa'o //
analyzed: de yang stong pa la khams gsum pa nyid mthong pa'o //
translated: And that is the vision of the three realms in the void.

original: ming zhes pa rab tu grags pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ming zhes pa rab tu grags pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Name is well known.

original: 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rim pa rnam bar gzhag pa yang gsungs pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rim pa rnam bar gzhag pa yang gsungs pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The very pure process of those who act for the benefit of the world is also taught.

original: 'o na rang byin gyis brlab pa ni khams gsum ba mthong ba nyid du gsungs la /
analyzed: 'o na rang byin gyis brlab pa ni khams gsum ba mthong ba nyid du gsungs la /
translated: Now, it is said that the self-consecration is the vision of the three realms.

original: de mthong ba las de mi ldog pa'i phyir des na 'khor ba gnas par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can sangs rgyas nyid ji srid ce na /
analyzed: de mthong ba las de mi ldog pa'i phyir des na 'khor ba gnas par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can sangs rgyas nyid ji srid ce na /
translated: Since one does not turn away from that vision, then for how long is Buddhahood, which has the characteristic of the abiding of cyclic life?

original: gsungs pa / 'khor ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'khor ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: It is said:

original: /'khor bar te khams gsum pa snying po med pa brdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can la sangs rgyas nyid de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam gyi mkhyen pa nyid dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnam par 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'bras bu ste snying por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: /'khor bar te khams gsum pa snying po med pa brdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can la sangs rgyas nyid de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam gyi mkhyen pa nyid dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnam par 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'bras bu ste snying por 'gyur ro //
translated: Cyclic life is the essence of the three realms, which is insubstantial, false, and deceptive. Buddhahood is the essence, the result, which is characterized by the perfection of the qualities of omniscience, knowledge of all aspects, knowledge of the path, the ten powers, the four forms of fearlessness, and so forth.

original: de zad las te 'khor ba zad pa de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de zad las te 'khor ba zad pa de ma thag tu'o //
translated: It arises immediately after the exhaustion of cyclic life, the exhaustion of karma.

original: ci dang 'dra bar 'byung zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar 'byung zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: In what way does it arise? It is said:

original: chu shing gi 'bras bu bzhin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: chu shing gi 'bras bu bzhin zhes pa ste /
translated: Like the fruit of the plantain tree.

original: ji ltar snying po med pa'i chu shing las snying po 'bras bu smin pa chu shing nyams pas yang dag par 'byung bde bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar snying po med pa'i chu shing las snying po 'bras bu smin pa chu shing nyams pas yang dag par 'byung bde bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as from a plantain tree, which is without essence, a fruit ripens, which is the essence, and the plantain tree is destroyed, so too is buddhahood.

original: 'o na sangs rgyas nyid ni sgrub par byed pa byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems su 'dod na de kho na nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa ni de kho na nyid do zhes pa'i gsung gi phyir de yang sgyu ma las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir
analyzed: 'o na sangs rgyas nyid ni sgrub par byed pa byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems su 'dod na de kho na nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa ni de kho na nyid do zhes pa'i gsung gi phyir de yang sgyu ma las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir
translated: Now, if buddhahood is asserted to be the establishment of the bodhisattva’s spirit of enlightenment, then since it is said that “the establishment of reality is reality itself,” that spirit of enlightenment is also an illusion, because it is born from an illusion.

original: sgyu ma ni rang rig pa yin la /
analyzed: sgyu ma ni rang rig pa yin la /
translated: An illusion is self-awareness.

original: de 'jug bzhin pa'i de kho na ma yin pa ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub par byed par 'gyur bar 'os she na /
analyzed: de 'jug bzhin pa'i de kho na ma yin pa ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub par byed par 'gyur bar 'os she na /
translated: How could that which is not reality, which is engaged in that way, be suitable to establish buddhahood?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / sdig pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / sdig pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Sin, and so on.

original: sdig pa ni shu ka'i srin bu'o //
analyzed: sdig pa ni shu ka'i srin bu'o //
translated: Sin is a worm.

original: ku l'i ra ni karka ta'o //
analyzed: ku l'i ra ni karka ta'o //
translated: The kuḷa is a crab.

original: gang gi skabs las byung zhing 'byung ba rang gi med de rnams kyis nyams par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes pa de ltar rnal 'byor gyi sems te /
analyzed: gang gi skabs las byung zhing 'byung ba rang gi med de rnams kyis nyams par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes pa de ltar rnal 'byor gyi sems te /
translated: The mind of the yogi, which is arisen from the occasion of the arising of those, is destroyed.

original: rnal 'byor ni shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: Yoga is the union of wisdom and means.

original: de la yod ba'i sems gang yin pa dbang bskur bzhi pa sgyu ma gang rig ba 'pho ba'i chos can gyi skabs las kun rdzob tu @313b skyes pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de la yod ba'i sems gang yin pa dbang bskur bzhi pa sgyu ma gang rig ba 'pho ba'i chos can gyi skabs las kun rdzob tu @313b skyes pa yin zhing /
translated: The mind that exists there, which is the fourth initiation, is born conventionally from the occasion of the illusion that is the subject of the transference of consciousness.

original: de rnam par nyams par byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnam par nyams par byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: It is destroyed.

original: sgyu ma dang bral bas na 'khor ba slar ldog pa med par brjod de de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi dbugs 'byung ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang bral bas na 'khor ba slar ldog pa med par brjod de de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi dbugs 'byung ba'i don du'o //
translated: Since it is free from illusion, samsara is said to be reversed, for the sake of the exhalation of the yogis of reality.

original: 'o na byang chub kyi sems ni be mas bo'i khams su 'dir brjod la /
analyzed: 'o na byang chub kyi sems ni be mas bo'i khams su 'dir brjod la /
translated: Now, the bodhicitta is described here as the element of space.

original: de yang be mas po ma yin pa mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas nyid kyis sgrub par byed par ci ltar brjod ce na /
analyzed: de yang be mas po ma yin pa mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas nyid kyis sgrub par byed par ci ltar brjod ce na /
translated: How can it be said that the supreme, unchanging gnosis, which is not the ordinary bodhicitta, is accomplished by the Buddha?

original: brjod pa bden te /
analyzed: brjod pa bden te /
translated: It is said that this is true.

original: khu ba mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyis mchog tu mi 'gyur ba bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i gsungs las so //
analyzed: khu ba mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyis mchog tu mi 'gyur ba bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i gsungs las so //
translated: It is cultivated by the nature of unchanging bodhicitta.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor gyi sems 'di'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba bcu drug gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor gyi sems 'di'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba bcu drug gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, this yoga is said to have sixteen divisions of four aspects of supreme, unchanging bliss.

original: gnyis med ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis med ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sixteen are stated in the lines beginning “nondual” and so on.

original: gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems te /
analyzed: gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems te /
translated: “ Dual” refers to the mind of samsara and nirvana.

original: gang la yod ba ma yin ba de gnyis med do //
analyzed: gang la yod ba ma yin ba de gnyis med do //
translated: That which does not exist in this is nondual.

original: nor bu dang padma las g-yo ba med do zhes ba g-yo ba med do //
analyzed: nor bu dang padma las g-yo ba med do zhes ba g-yo ba med do //
translated: “ Unmoving” means that it does not move from the jewel and lotus.

original: gnyis rtog ste shes rab dang thabs kyi cha 'di la yod pa ma yin no zhes pa gnyis rtog med do //
analyzed: gnyis rtog ste shes rab dang thabs kyi cha 'di la yod pa ma yin no zhes pa gnyis rtog med do //
translated: “ Nondualistic” means that the aspects of wisdom and method do not exist in this.

original: bla na med pa'i bde ba ster ba nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'o zhes pa rnal 'byor bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i bde ba ster ba nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'o zhes pa rnal 'byor bzhi pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme bliss itself, and thus it is the desire. This is the fourth yoga.

original: dbugs brgya phrag drug lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'gog pa'i phyir mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dbugs brgya phrag drug lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'gog pa'i phyir mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme unchanging, because it stops the twenty-one thousand and six hundred breaths.

original: chags pa dang bral ba'i phyogs dkar po dang nag po zhes bya ba bdag gi gnas pa dang 'gro ba med pa'i phyir 'dod chags chen po'o //
analyzed: chags pa dang bral ba'i phyogs dkar po dang nag po zhes bya ba bdag gi gnas pa dang 'gro ba med pa'i phyir 'dod chags chen po'o //
translated: It is the great passion, because it is free from the white and black sides of passion, and because it is free from the movement and the abiding of the self.

original: rnam ba dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa las nges par grol ba nyid kyi phyir dngos dang dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam ba dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa las nges par grol ba nyid kyi phyir dngos dang dngos po med pa'o //
translated: It is the existent and the nonexistent, because it is free from the form and the formless.

original: shes bya ma lus pa mthong ba'i phyir ye shes so zhes rnal 'byor gsum pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya ma lus pa mthong ba'i phyir ye shes so zhes rnal 'byor gsum pa'o //
translated: It is the intuition, because it sees all objects of knowledge. This is the third yoga.

original: 'gro ba dga' bar byed pa sngon ma can sems can gyi don la kun nas chags pa nyid kyi phyir sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dga' bar byed pa sngon ma can sems can gyi don la kun nas chags pa nyid kyi phyir sems dpa'o //
translated: It is the hero, because it delights the world, because it is the prior cause, and because it is the passion for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: dang po dang / dbus dang / tha mar dge ba byed pa nyid kyi phyir kun du bzang po zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dang po dang / dbus dang / tha mar dge ba byed pa nyid kyi phyir kun du bzang po zhes pa'o //
translated: The first, middle, and last are virtuous, and so it is called all good.

original: bdud dang ; nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir sgra ste /
analyzed: bdud dang ; nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir sgra ste /
translated: It is sound because it is free from demons, afflictions, and discursive thoughts.

original: grag pa phyi dang nang gi brjod pa 'am /
analyzed: grag pa phyi dang nang gi brjod pa 'am /
translated: It is sound because it is free from the internal and external expressions of sound, or

original: yang na rab tu sgrogs shing rnam par lhod pa'i seng ge'i sgra can gyi g-yul 'di yod pa ma yin pas sgra 'thab med pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rab tu sgrogs shing rnam par lhod pa'i seng ge'i sgra can gyi g-yul 'di yod pa ma yin pas sgra 'thab med pa'o //
translated: it is sound because it is free from the battle of sound, since it does not have the battle of the lion's roar that is proclaimed and scattered.

original: gzhom du med pa'i sgra'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'di'i @314a * //
analyzed: gzhom du med pa'i sgra'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'di'i @314a * //
translated: It is sound because it is the nature of invincible sound,

original: sgra ste grags pa chen po'o zhes pa rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ste grags pa chen po'o zhes pa rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o //
translated: it is sound because it is great fame.

original: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnam par spongs pa nyid kyi phyir lhan skyes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnam par spongs pa nyid kyi phyir lhan skyes so //
translated: It is innate because it is the abandonment of worldly conduct.

original: sku bzhi'i sgrib pa zang pa'i phyir dpal ldan byang chub sems kyi thig le 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sku bzhi'i sgrib pa zang pa'i phyir dpal ldan byang chub sems kyi thig le 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is the glorious bindu of bodhicitta because it is the purification of the obscurations of the four kāyas.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje'o //
translated: Because of the indivisibility of emptiness and compassion, he is the glorious Wheel of Time, the vajra.

original: tshul khrims kyi tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor ro zhes pa rnal 'byor dang po'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor ro zhes pa rnal 'byor dang po'o //
translated: Because of the perfection of the accumulation of morality, he is the essence of wisdom and method, the yogi. This is the first yoga.

original: da ni bla ma bsten pa'i ched du rdo rje slob dpon yongs su brtag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bla ma bsten pa'i ched du rdo rje slob dpon yongs su brtag pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to serve the guru, he teaches the examination of the vajra master.

original: dang por zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang por zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: First, he says:

original: 'dir sngags kyi tshul la 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob ma rnams kyis bla ma la bsten par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir sngags kyi tshul la 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob ma rnams kyis bla ma la bsten par bya ste /
translated: Here, disciples who desire mundane and supramundane powers in the way of mantra should rely on the guru.

original: de yang yang dag par yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang yang dag par yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, they should examine him well.

original: byang chub kyi sems bsrung pa'i phyir dam tshig can no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bsrung pa'i phyir dam tshig can no //
translated: He is one who has the commitments in order to protect the mind of enlightenment.

original: bsten par bya ste bu dang chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: bsten par bya ste bu dang chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mnyes par bya'o //
translated: He should be served, pleased with one's children, spouse, and so forth.

original: rdo rje theg par lhag par gnas pa ni sngags kyi theg pa chen po lhag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje theg par lhag par gnas pa ni sngags kyi theg pa chen po lhag par gnas pa'o //
translated: The abiding in the Vajra Vehicle is the abiding in the Mantra Vehicle.

original: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes sgom pa po nyid kyi phyir de kho na nyid bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes sgom pa po nyid kyi phyir de kho na nyid bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of reality is the cultivation of the supreme unchanging bliss.

original: bu dang chung ma la sogs pa thams cad dang / rang gi lus la yang ltos pa med pa'i phyir ma chags pa'o //
analyzed: bu dang chung ma la sogs pa thams cad dang / rang gi lus la yang ltos pa med pa'i phyir ma chags pa'o //
translated: The absence of attachment is the absence of regard for anything, such as sons, wives, etc., or even one's own body.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o //
translated: The absence of stain is the absence of faults such as passion.

original: bzod pa la dang tshul te 'bras bu la ltos pa med par 'jug pa gang gi rang bzhin yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: bzod pa la dang tshul te 'bras bu la ltos pa med par 'jug pa gang gi rang bzhin yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: The patience is the nature of the one who engages in the path without regard for the fruit.

original: lam ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam ste /
analyzed: lam ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam ste /
translated: The path is the path of the perfect Buddha.

original: de la 'ug pa'i ngang tshul can ni lam la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'ug pa'i ngang tshul can ni lam la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The owl-like patience is the engagement in the path.

original: bla ma 'di mnyes par byas par gyur na slob ma rnams la lam gyi sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog par 'gyur //
analyzed: bla ma 'di mnyes par byas par gyur na slob ma rnams la lam gyi sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog par 'gyur //
translated: If one pleases this guru, he will bestow the path on the disciples and will remove the fear of hell.

original: de yang de kho na nyid las tshangs spyod ldan te mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i de ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: de yang de kho na nyid las tshangs spyod ldan te mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i de ba thob pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with pure conduct from reality, having attained the supreme unchanging bliss.

original: bdud rnams kyi ni ste bdud bzhi bo rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa dang 'dra bas rdo rje dbyug pa ste /
analyzed: bdud rnams kyi ni ste bdud bzhi bo rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa dang 'dra bas rdo rje dbyug pa ste /
translated: Of the demons, i.e., of the four demons, he is the vajra club, because he is like a vajra club,

original: 'joms par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'joms par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because he is the destroyer.

original: brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can mtshan nyid can gyi dpal ldan bla ma ste /
analyzed: brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can mtshan nyid can gyi dpal ldan bla ma ste /
translated: He is the glorious guru, who has the nature of the expression.

original: yang rdo rje 'dzin ma'i gzhi la rdo rje sems dpas @314b byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags te sprul pa'i sku yis so //🔽da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi che dang lha'i dmigs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang rdo rje 'dzin ma'i gzhi la rdo rje sems dpas @314b byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags te sprul pa'i sku yis so // da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi che dang lha'i dmigs pa gsungs pa /
translated: He is renowned as Vajrasattva, because he is the one who has a body blessed by Vajrasattva in the abode of Vajradhara, by means of the emanation body.

original: mngon sum zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum zhes pa'o //
translated: Now, he declares the means of attaining the supramundane powers and the visualization of the deity.🔽In the direct perception,

original: de kho na nyid sbyor las te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid sbyor las te /
translated: from the reality union,

original: sna tshogs gzugs brnyan bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor las so //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs brnyan bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor las so //
translated: from the yoga of meditating on the various reflected images.

original: skar ma'i tshogs bzhin zhes pa nor bu sngon po dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam ba can gyi thig le'i dbus sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa mthong ba sngon ma can khams gsum pa bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa mthong ba'o //
analyzed: skar ma'i tshogs bzhin zhes pa nor bu sngon po dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam ba can gyi thig le'i dbus sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa mthong ba sngon ma can khams gsum pa bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa mthong ba'o //
translated: Like a multitude of stars, means that one sees the infinite Buddhas of the Body of Fruition in the center of the bindu which has the form of the sphere of the moon, and the three worlds in the form of vases, carpets, etc.

original: sha'i mig gis ni dpag tshad brgya'i bar du chos pa'i dngos po mthong bas te /🔽mngon par shes pa rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: sha'i mig gis ni dpag tshad brgya'i bar du chos pa'i dngos po mthong bas te / mngon par shes pa rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The fleshly eye sees the things of the world up to a distance of one hundred leagues.

original: lha mig ste 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pas bar du chod pa'i phra mo dang cig shos kyi gzugs mthong bas so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis te gzhan gyi sems rig las so //
analyzed: lha mig ste 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pas bar du chod pa'i phra mo dang cig shos kyi gzugs mthong bas so // sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis te gzhan gyi sems rig las so //
translated: The divine eye sees the subtle and gross forms of the worlds, even those that are far away, by means of the superknowledges of magic powers, etc.

original: shes rab kyi spyan gyis te chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi spyan gyis te chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //
translated: The eye of wisdom sees all dharmas by means of the nonconceptual characteristic.🔽The eye of Dharma sees the truth of cessation by means of the path of insight.🔽The Buddha eye sees the infinite worlds by means of the path of cultivation.

original: ye shes spyan gyis te dngos po thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mthong bas so //
analyzed: ye shes spyan gyis te dngos po thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mthong bas so //
translated: With the eye of intuition, because of seeing all the aspects of all things.

original: sems can gzhan rnams ni tshu rol mthong ba rnams so //
analyzed: sems can gzhan rnams ni tshu rol mthong ba rnams so //
translated: Other sentient beings are “near-sighted” because of not seeing the ultimate.

original: shi ba'i lus bzhin zhes pa ni g-yo ba dang 'gul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shi ba'i lus bzhin zhes pa ni g-yo ba dang 'gul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Like a dead body” means because of the absence of movement and vibration.

original: byas pa ni sa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: byas pa ni sa la sogs pas so //
translated: “Made” means by earth and so forth.

original: blugs pa ni ra gan la sogs pas so //
analyzed: blugs pa ni ra gan la sogs pas so //
translated: “Poured” means by brass and so forth.

original: bshang ba la sogs pa ni bi ra shu ma mu ste lnga'o //
analyzed: bshang ba la sogs pa ni bi ra shu ma mu ste lnga'o //
translated: “Excrement” and so forth are the five, virasamūtra.

original: go ku la sogs pa ni gho ku da ha na ste lnga'o //
analyzed: go ku la sogs pa ni gho ku da ha na ste lnga'o //
translated: “Cow” and so forth are the five, ghoṣadaha.

original: nang du bdud rtsi lnga ni phung po lnga rnams so //
analyzed: nang du bdud rtsi lnga ni phung po lnga rnams so //
translated: “The five nectars” internally are the five aggregates.

original: dbang po lnga rnams ni sgron ma lnga'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po lnga rnams ni sgron ma lnga'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The five sense organs are the five lamps.

original: gsungs pa'ang nyin dang mtshan mor thig le las ni dkar bo'i rgyun 'bab gang ste m'a ma k'i ste chang ma yin //
analyzed: gsungs pa'ang nyin dang mtshan mor thig le las ni dkar bo'i rgyun 'bab gang ste m'a ma k'i ste chang ma yin //
translated: It is said that day and night, the stream of white flows from the drop, which is Māmakī, the beer-woman.

original: go ku sogs ni nyin zhag so sor mig la sogs pa spro ba'o sha gzhan res 'ga' yang ni min //
analyzed: go ku sogs ni nyin zhag so sor mig la sogs pa spro ba'o sha gzhan res 'ga' yang ni min //
translated: Cow and so forth are the daily emanation of the eyes and so forth. Other flesh is not at any time.

original: rang rig sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste //
analyzed: rang rig sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste //
translated: The gods who abide in the stage of self-consecration, by means of the five ambrosias in the pure body,

original: stong par sems rab 'jug las lhan skyes sems kyi bde ba 'khrig pa'o de ni skye gnas pa ma yin //🔽zhes so // dbyung ba dang dgad ba dang bum pa can gyi rnal 'byor te aom yig phyir 'gro ba dang / a'a: yig 'jug pa dang @315a * //
analyzed: stong par sems rab 'jug las lhan skyes sems kyi bde ba 'khrig pa'o de ni skye gnas pa ma yin // zhes so // dbyung ba dang dgad ba dang bum pa can gyi rnal 'byor te aom yig phyir 'gro ba dang / a'a: yig 'jug pa dang @315a * //
translated: are devoted to the innate bliss of the mind which enters into emptiness, which is not a place of birth.🔽The yoga of exhalation, inhalation, and retention is the characteristic of the discernment of the syllable OṂ going out, the syllable AḤ coming in,

original: h'um yig gnas par so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: h'um yig gnas par so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: and the syllable HŪṂ abiding.

original: ma bsdams pa ni brtan par ma byas pas so //
analyzed: ma bsdams pa ni brtan par ma byas pas so //
translated: Not bound means not made firm.

original: thun mong gi dngos grub kyi don du ni 'jig rten pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi don du'o //
analyzed: thun mong gi dngos grub kyi don du ni 'jig rten pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi don du'o //
translated: For the sake of the common accomplishments means for the sake of the mundane accomplishments of pacification, and so on.

original: sdud pa ni mngon du phyogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sdud pa ni mngon du phyogs par byed pa ste /
translated: Gathering means directing.

original: 'jig rten pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la mngon du phyogs par byed pa so sor spangs pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la mngon du phyogs par byed pa so sor spangs pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it is the individual abandonment of directing oneself to the mundane forms, and so on,

original: so sor sdud pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: it is called individual gathering.

original: gzhan rnams kyi gzugs la sogs pa ni rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi gzugs la sogs pa ni rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
