translated: The others are the forms, etc. of the supramundane nature, which transcend the nature of the subtle atoms.

original: bsam gtan ni shes rab dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang g-yo med bde ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni shes rab dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang g-yo med bde ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Meditation has the nature of wisdom, thought, investigation, joy, and immovable bliss.

original: srog rtsol ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: srog rtsol ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Breath control has the nature of destroying the courses of the moon and sun.

original: 'dzin pa ni gsang ba dang lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i sgo yis thig le la 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni gsang ba dang lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i sgo yis thig le la 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Retention has the nature of stopping the drops by the doors of going and coming at the secret place, the navel, the heart, the throat, and the forehead.

original: rdo rje padma ni gtsug tor gyi padma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje padma ni gtsug tor gyi padma ste /
translated: The vajra lotus is the lotus of the crown protuberance.

original: der byung ba nyid las rdo rje padmar skyes pa'i bdud rtsi des de byang chub kyi sems mi 'pho bas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: der byung ba nyid las rdo rje padmar skyes pa'i bdud rtsi des de byang chub kyi sems mi 'pho bas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the bodhicitta does not move because of the nectar that arises there and is born in the vajra lotus.

original: chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa ni snying ga dang / lte ba dang gsang ba'i padma'i ze 'brur ro mnyam par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa ni snying ga dang / lte ba dang gsang ba'i padma'i ze 'brur ro mnyam par gyur pa'o //
translated: The union of the lotus is the union of the anthers of the heart, navel, and secret lotuses.

original: su shu ma n'a'i rtsa ni dung can ma ste /
analyzed: su shu ma n'a'i rtsa ni dung can ma ste /
translated: The susumnā channel is the one with the conch.

original: de'i steng du khu ba yang dag par sbyor ba las te /
analyzed: de'i steng du khu ba yang dag par sbyor ba las te /
translated: Above it, from the union of the semen,

original: byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba las so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba las so //
translated: from the movement of the bodhicitta,

original: 'dis ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor gsungs so //🔽da ni dman pa dang mchog gi dbye bas bsnyen pa la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor gsungs so // da ni dman pa dang mchog gi dbye bas bsnyen pa la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: this teaches the subtle yoga.

original: dang por zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang por zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, in order to describe the approach and so on by way of the division into inferior and superior, he says, “First, having abandoned the aggregates,” and so on.

original: phung po yongs su dor ba las zhes pa da ltar ba'i lus yongs su btang ba las so //
analyzed: phung po yongs su dor ba las zhes pa da ltar ba'i lus yongs su btang ba las so //
translated: “Having abandoned the aggregates” means having given up the present body.

original: skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po 'dzin pa las zhes pa 'byung ba'i srid pa kun 'dzin pa las so //
analyzed: skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po 'dzin pa las zhes pa 'byung ba'i srid pa kun 'dzin pa las so //
translated: “Having taken up the aggregates that belong to birth” means having taken up the existence of the intermediate existence.

original: 'di'i dbus te gang bar du srid pa bar ma'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'di'i dbus te gang bar du srid pa bar ma'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: “In the middle of this” is the characteristic of the intermediate existence.

original: srid pa gsum mthong ba ni srid pa gsum dngos su mthong ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa gsum mthong ba ni srid pa gsum dngos su mthong ba'o //
translated: “Seeing the three existences” is directly seeing the three existences.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bag chags ma lus pa'i rten gyi rdul dang khu pa'i thig le'i dbus su sems 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bag chags ma lus pa'i rten gyi rdul dang khu pa'i thig le'i dbus su sems 'jug pa ste /
translated: The mind enters the center of the drop of semen and ovum, which is the support of the store consciousness and all the habitual tendencies.

original: ma'i mngal du khu ba'i thig le rnams 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par 'dzin no //
analyzed: ma'i mngal du khu ba'i thig le rnams 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par 'dzin no //
translated: The holding of the drops of semen in the mother's womb is the perfect holding.

original: zla ba bdun rnams kyis zhes pa spyi'i ngo bo @315b las zla ba dgu rnams kyis zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zla ba bdun rnams kyis zhes pa spyi'i ngo bo @315b las zla ba dgu rnams kyis zhes brjod do //
translated: The seven months is a general statement; it should be said nine months.

original: lha'i sgrub pa la mngal gyi dpe yis te /
analyzed: lha'i sgrub pa la mngal gyi dpe yis te /
translated: The divine practice is by the example of the womb.

original: des na de nas zhes pa la sogs pas nye ba'i sgrub pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gsum gsal bar mdzad do //
analyzed: des na de nas zhes pa la sogs pas nye ba'i sgrub pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gsum gsal bar mdzad do //
translated: Therefore, from that and so forth clarify the three branches of the near attainment and so forth.

original: phung po drug po rnams kyis te /
analyzed: phung po drug po rnams kyis te /
translated: The six aggregates are

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang ; rnam par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can rnams so //
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang ; rnam par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can rnams so //
translated: form, feeling, perception, mental formations, consciousness, and the one characterized by intuition.

original: 'di ni spyi'i bsnye pa ste 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni spyi'i bsnye pa ste 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi bsnyen pa'o //
translated: This is the general approach, the approach for the mundane powers.

original: de bzhin du nye ba'i sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i zhes pa ste de nyid kyi phyir chu gter la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nye ba'i sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i zhes pa ste de nyid kyi phyir chu gter la sogs pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the near-accomplishment, the accomplishment, and the great accomplishment, and therefore the ocean, etc.

original: 'dis ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdzogs pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdzogs pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This explains the perfection of body, speech, mind, and gnosis.

original: sgrub pa 'bring po zhes pa ni nye ba'i sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa 'bring po zhes pa ni nye ba'i sgrub pa ste /
translated: The near-accomplishment is called the middling accomplishment.

original: 'bring po zhes pa 'dis sgrub par khyad par du byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bring po zhes pa 'dis sgrub par khyad par du byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: By this middling, it is distinguished as an accomplishment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir srog rdzogs pa'o zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir srog rdzogs pa'o zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is explained as the perfection of life.

original: 'di la zhes pa de ma thag tu brjod pa'i bsnyen pa dang ; nye ba'i sgrub pa dag la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes pa de ma thag tu brjod pa'i bsnyen pa dang ; nye ba'i sgrub pa dag la'o //
translated: Here, in the previously mentioned approach and near-accomplishment,

original: thabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes pa chung du la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: thabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes pa chung du la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the method is of four kinds, meaning of four kinds such as the small.

original: de bzhin rnams la dbus su rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de bzhin rnams la dbus su rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Likewise, in the others, there are two kinds in the middle.

original: de'i phyir bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa dag la'o //
translated: Therefore, in the approach and near-approach.

original: rnam pa bzhi zhes pa chung du la sogs pa rnams pa gnyis ni phyir nas sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi zhes pa chung du la sogs pa rnams pa gnyis ni phyir nas sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The four types are the two types of small and so forth, which will be applied later.

original: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po dag la'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po dag la'o //
translated: They are in the approach and great approach.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: bsnyen pa'i yan lag la dang nye ba'i sgrub pa'i yan lag la zhes so //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i yan lag la dang nye ba'i sgrub pa'i yan lag la zhes so //
translated: In the branch of approach and in the branch of close approach.

original: dman pa dang brten pa zhes pa yang brjod ma thag pa'i bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i sgrub pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po dang 'brel lo //
analyzed: dman pa dang brten pa zhes pa yang brjod ma thag pa'i bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i sgrub pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po dang 'brel lo //
translated: Inferior and superior are also related to the just mentioned approach and close approach, and to the approach and great approach that will be explained.

original: de yang sdeb sbyor gyi dor dang po dang mtha' smos pa'i so sor bsdu bas te /
analyzed: de yang sdeb sbyor gyi dor dang po dang mtha' smos pa'i so sor bsdu bas te /
translated: Moreover, the first and last are included by the omission of the meter, and the individual is included by ellipsis.

original: de'i phyir 'dir 'bring po'i byis pa dang / gzhon du dag kyang 'dzin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir 'bring po'i byis pa dang / gzhon du dag kyang 'dzin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore here the middle, the child and youth, should also be understood to be included.

original: brtan pa ni dar ma'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni dar ma'o //
translated: The superior is the adult.

original: rtsa bar de bzhin nyid ces pa sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag la'o zhes pa'i don to ;
analyzed: rtsa bar de bzhin nyid ces pa sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag la'o zhes pa'i don to ;
translated: In the root, suchness is in the branch of the great approach.

original: / gzhon nu ni dman pa ma yin pa yan lag gsum pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: / gzhon nu ni dman pa ma yin pa yan lag gsum pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The youth is the third stage, which is not inferior.

original: 'dis ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa bzhi dang sbyar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa bzhi dang sbyar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is applied to the four stages of approach and so forth.

original: skyes pa kho na dang bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa'i lus nges par brtan pa btsas pa ni don dper brjod nas ston par byed de 'dir zhes pa la @316a * //
analyzed: skyes pa kho na dang bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa'i lus nges par brtan pa btsas pa ni don dper brjod nas ston par byed de 'dir zhes pa la @316a * //
translated: The born and so forth are the body, which is definitely firm. The example is taught by the word here and so forth.

original: sogs pa'o // dman pa ni skyes pa'i byis pa'o zhes zla ba thig le sdud pas btsas pa'i mtshams ni dman pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'o // dman pa ni skyes pa'i byis pa'o zhes zla ba thig le sdud pas btsas pa'i mtshams ni dman pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The inferior is the child who is born. The born is the stage of the inferior, according to the summary of the Moon Drop.

original: dman pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas thob pa zhes pa dman pa la sogs pa bzhi so sor sa gsum la sbyar ba'o zhes pa'i don to /
analyzed: dman pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas thob pa zhes pa dman pa la sogs pa bzhi so sor sa gsum la sbyar ba'o zhes pa'i don to /
translated: The attainment by the divisions of the inferior and so forth is the individual application of the four, the inferior and so forth, to the three stages. This is the meaning.

original: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa ye shes dang ldan pa'i mthar thug pa'i sa bcu gnyis kyi thob pa las bcu gnyis kyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa ye shes dang ldan pa'i mthar thug pa'i sa bcu gnyis kyi thob pa las bcu gnyis kyi dbang phyug go //
translated: The lord of the twelve is the attainment of the twelve stages, the ultimate stage of the wisdom of the Joyous and so forth.

original: de'i phyir bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni kho bos mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i brjod byang bdud rtsi'i thigs par bkral zin to zhes pas 'dir rgyas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni kho bos mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i brjod byang bdud rtsi'i thigs par bkral zin to zhes pas 'dir rgyas par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the verse “Thus, the twelve aspects of the truth,” and so on, has been explained in my commentary on the Saṃpūṭa Tantra, the Drop of Nectar.

original: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i lam brjod par bya ste stong pa zhes so //
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i lam brjod par bya ste stong pa zhes so //
translated: Now, the path that accomplishes the supramundane powers will be explained: “The path of smoke and so on in the empty,” and so on.

original: stong par du ba la sogs lam ni bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang las te 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pa las bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: stong par du ba la sogs lam ni bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang las te 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pa las bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The path of smoke and so on is meditated on from the guru’s definitive initiation, according to the process that will be explained.

original: gzugs brnyan mtshams su ste gzugs brnyan ni rnam pa thams cad pa sna tshogs pa ste de'i mthar thug par sems kyis so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan mtshams su ste gzugs brnyan ni rnam pa thams cad pa sna tshogs pa ste de'i mthar thug par sems kyis so zhes pa'o //
translated: “ At the end of the image” means at the end of the image, which is the complete form, the variety.

original: mtshams de nas rtsa'i 'khor lo rnams su srog gi rlung ni rten pa'ang byed de thur sel gyi rlung yang rnal 'byor pa yis so //
analyzed: mtshams de nas rtsa'i 'khor lo rnams su srog gi rlung ni rten pa'ang byed de thur sel gyi rlung yang rnal 'byor pa yis so //
translated: “ The yogi also supports the life-force vāyu in the cakras of the nāḍīs, and also the evacuative vāyu.”

original: phyi nas zla ba 'gog pa zhes gza' bzhin te sgra gcan bzhin du'o //
analyzed: phyi nas zla ba 'gog pa zhes gza' bzhin te sgra gcan bzhin du'o //
translated: The moon is blocked from outside, like a planet, that is, like Rāhu.

original: zla ba ste byang chub sems so //
analyzed: zla ba ste byang chub sems so //
translated: The moon is the bodhicitta.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa srog dang thur sel dag phan tshun du yang dag par sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa srog dang thur sel dag phan tshun du yang dag par sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor te /
translated: The yogī is one who has the yoga, that is, the union of prāṇa and apāna.

original: de gang la yod pa zhes pa rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa zhes pa rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The yogī is one who has that.

original: byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i skad cig 'gog cing nye bar zhi ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i skad cig 'gog cing nye bar zhi ba ste /
translated: The yogī blocks the moment of the bodhicitta's emission and pacifies it.

original: rgyu mthun la sogs pas 'gyur ba med par byed cing de'i phyir rgyu mthun pa dang rnam par smin pa dang skyes bu byed pa dang dri ma med pa nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu mthun la sogs pas 'gyur ba med par byed cing de'i phyir rgyu mthun pa dang rnam par smin pa dang skyes bu byed pa dang dri ma med pa nyid do //
translated: He makes it unchanging through the natural outflow and so forth, and therefore it is the natural outflow, the maturation, the activity of a person, and the stainless.

original: gang cung zad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste de byed do //
analyzed: gang cung zad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste de byed do //
translated: He does what cannot be expressed in any way.

original: nyin zhag nyung zad kyis ni lo gsum dang phyogs gsum dus kyi 'khor lo'i nyin zhag rnams kyis te phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob po zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyin zhag nyung zad kyis ni lo gsum dang phyogs gsum dus kyi 'khor lo'i nyin zhag rnams kyis te phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob po zhes pa'i don to //
translated: In a few days, in three years and three half-months, by the days of the Wheel of Time, he attains the Great Seal's accomplishment, is the meaning.

original: da ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gis rnal 'byor yan lag drug gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gis rnal 'byor yan lag drug gsungs pa /
translated: The meditation on the signs of smoke, etc., by the beginner is the yoga of withdrawal.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of meditative concentration is the vajra recitation.🔽 The vajra recitation is the yoga of meditative concentration.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of breath control is the vajra repetition.🔽 The vajra repetition is the yoga of breath control.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of retention is the vajra yoga.🔽 The vajra yoga is the yoga of retention.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of recollection is the vajra contemplation.🔽 The vajra contemplation is the yoga of recollection.

original: so sor sdud pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The verse continues, The yoga of meditative absorption is the vajra sameness.🔽 The vajra sameness is the yoga of meditative absorption.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra waves is the vajra waves.🔽 The vajra waves is the yoga of the vajra waves.

original: las dang po pa du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bsgom pa ni @316b rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: las dang po pa du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bsgom pa ni @316b rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra body is the vajra body.

original: ral gri can ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: ral gri can ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The vajra body is the yoga of the vajra body.

original: 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bcu'i dbye ba las zhes pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bcu'i dbye ba las zhes pa /
translated: The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra speech is the vajra speech.🔽 The vajra speech is the yoga of the vajra speech.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra mind is the vajra mind.🔽 The vajra mind is the yoga of the vajra mind.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra waves is the vajra waves.🔽 The vajra waves is the yoga of the vajra waves.

original: bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog padma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang // 'dar dang smyo ba rab tu rmongs par gyur dang yid kyi rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu rgyal ba ni //
analyzed: bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog padma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang // 'dar dang smyo ba rab tu rmongs par gyur dang yid kyi rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu rgyal ba ni //
translated: The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra body is the vajra body.🔽 The vajra body is the yoga of the vajra body.🔽The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra speech is the vajra speech.🔽 The vajra speech is the yoga of the vajra speech.

original: rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du //🔽rab gsal nges pa de rnams yid sgrub gnas skabs rnams su su zhig rgyal ba'i 'dod pa de ni su //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du //🔽rab gsal nges pa de rnams yid sgrub gnas skabs rnams su su zhig rgyal ba'i 'dod pa de ni su //
translated: The verse continues, The yoga of the vajra mind is the vajra mind.🔽 The vajra mind is the yoga of the vajra mind.

original: zhes pa'o // rlung bcu rnams te srog dang / thur sel dang ; mnyam gnas dang / gyen rgyu dang / khyab byed dang / klu dang / rus sbal dang / rtsangs pa dang / lhas byin dang / nor las rgyal ba rnams 'gog cing nye bar zhi ba mi 'gyur bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // rlung bcu rnams te srog dang / thur sel dang ; mnyam gnas dang / gyen rgyu dang / khyab byed dang / klu dang / rus sbal dang / rtsangs pa dang / lhas byin dang / nor las rgyal ba rnams 'gog cing nye bar zhi ba mi 'gyur bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus, the ten winds—life, downward-voiding, upward-moving, fire-accompanying, pervasive, snake, tortoise, lizard, devadatta, and dhananjaya—are stopped and do not move.

original: chags pa dang bral ba'i phyogs med pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o ;
analyzed: chags pa dang bral ba'i phyogs med pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o ;
translated: Since there is no side of freedom from attachment, there is nonabiding nirvana.

original: / re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las aa sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o zhes gsal byed sum cu'i bdag nyid ka tsa ta ta pa sa rnams nam mkha' dang / rlung dang / me dang / chu dang / sa dang /
analyzed: / re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las aa sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o zhes gsal byed sum cu'i bdag nyid ka tsa ta ta pa sa rnams nam mkha' dang / rlung dang / me dang / chu dang / sa dang /
translated: Each is divided into five, and they are again divided by the vowels a, ā, and so on and the consonants ka, kha, and so on. The thirty consonants ka, ca, ṭa, ta, pa, and so on are the nature of space, wind, fire, water, and earth, respectively.

original: ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin rnams kyis dang / aa ai ri au li yig dbyangs thung du lnga yis phye ba rnams kyis dang / de bzhin du sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin l'i yig la sogs pa dbyangs ring po lnga yis phye ba rnams kyis te spro ba dang sdud pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin rnams kyis dang / aa ai ri au li yig dbyangs thung du lnga yis phye ba rnams kyis dang / de bzhin du sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin l'i yig la sogs pa dbyangs ring po lnga yis phye ba rnams kyis te spro ba dang sdud pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The vowels a, a, i, u, and l, which are the nature of the five wisdom constituents, and the vowels a, a, i, u, and l, which are the nature of the five elements, earth and so on, are divided by the five short vowels a, a, i, u, and l, and the five long vowels a, a, i, u, and l, respectively, in the process of emanation and re-absorption.

original: lug dang glang la sogs pa 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas te drug cus lhag pa'i brgya phrag gsum gyi dbugs rnams so //
analyzed: lug dang glang la sogs pa 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas te drug cus lhag pa'i brgya phrag gsum gyi dbugs rnams so //
translated: The three hundred and sixty breaths are divided into twelve transits, such as Aries and Taurus.

original: lhor bgrod pa la gsal byed gcig pa dang dbyangs thung du'o //
analyzed: lhor bgrod pa la gsal byed gcig pa dang dbyangs thung du'o //
translated: In the southern transit, there is one consonant and a short vowel.

original: byang du bgrod pa la gsal byed brtsegs pa dang dbyangs ring po ste nyi ma'o //
analyzed: byang du bgrod pa la gsal byed brtsegs pa dang dbyangs ring po ste nyi ma'o //
translated: In the northern transit, there is a consonant stack and a long vowel, which is the sun.

original: 'pho ba na gsal byed gsum brtsegs pa dang shin tu ring po ste sgra gcan no //
analyzed: 'pho ba na gsal byed gsum brtsegs pa dang shin tu ring po ste sgra gcan no //
translated: In the transit, there is a stack of three consonants and a very long vowel, which is Rāhu.

original: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i phyi mo'i dbye bas spyod cing dbye bar bya ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i phyi mo'i dbye bas spyod cing dbye bar bya ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is to be practiced and divided by the distinctions of the principles of sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: mig la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyis zhes pa sha'i la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyis zhes pa sha'i la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The others, such as the eye, etc., are the flesh, etc.

original: lta ba ni sna tshogs gzugs can la lta pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba ni sna tshogs gzugs can la lta pa'o //
translated: The view is the seeing of various forms.

original: dngos po 'dzin pa ni dngos po la nges par rtogs pa'o //🔽de'i ste dngos po'i don nges @317a * //
analyzed: dngos po 'dzin pa ni dngos po la nges par rtogs pa'o // de'i ste dngos po'i don nges @317a * //
translated: The apprehension of things is the ascertainment of things.

original: bar byed pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du nges par 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bar byed pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du nges par 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of the meaning of things is the ascertainment of the nature of emptiness.

original: gzugs la chags pa ni yul bzlog pas yid tsam du nang du phyogs pas lha'i bdag nyid la dmigs bzhin pas bla na med pa'i shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par rnam par dpyod pa las de kho na nyid la 'jug cing mngon du phyogs pas gang yid
analyzed: gzugs la chags pa ni yul bzlog pas yid tsam du nang du phyogs pas lha'i bdag nyid la dmigs bzhin pas bla na med pa'i shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par rnam par dpyod pa las de kho na nyid la 'jug cing mngon du phyogs pas gang yid
translated: The attachment to form is the turning away from objects, the inward orientation of the mind, the observation of the nature of the gods, the analysis of the single taste of wisdom and means, the entry into reality, and the orientation toward it.🔽That which is the very bliss of the mind

original: bde ba nyid de de ni dga' ba ste rangs pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba nyid de de ni dga' ba ste rangs pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: is joy, is delight.

original: lus shin tu sbyangs pa la sogs pa'i bde ba ni g-yo med bde ba'o //🔽dbu ma'i lam du rab tu 'jug pa zhes pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bcu 'jig pas brkyang ma dang ro ma dag 'gags pa'i dbu ma'i lam kho nar rab tu 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid
analyzed: lus shin tu sbyangs pa la sogs pa'i bde ba ni g-yo med bde ba'o // dbu ma'i lam du rab tu 'jug pa zhes pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bcu 'jig pas brkyang ma dang ro ma dag 'gags pa'i dbu ma'i lam kho nar rab tu 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid
translated: The bliss of physical pliancy and so on is unwavering bliss.🔽The statement “it engages the path of the central nāḍī” means that the subtle vāyu of life enters only the path of the central nāḍī, which is blocked by the cakras of the navel and so on, and the space and earth cakras, and so on.

original: can srog gi rlung phra mo 'jug pa ni srog rtsol lo zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: can srog gi rlung phra mo 'jug pa ni srog rtsol lo zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: The definition of the central nāḍī is “the path of entering, abiding, and arising.”

original: gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom pa zhes pa ni lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang / gtsug tor rnams su 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral bas 'gro bar byed pa dang bral ba'o zhes byas nas /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom pa zhes pa ni lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang / gtsug tor rnams su 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral bas 'gro bar byed pa dang bral ba'o zhes byas nas /
translated: The statement “it conquers the path of both” means that since the vāyu moves through the navel, heart, throat, head, and uṣṇīṣa, it is free of coming and going.

original: rim pas rlung rnams med pa la thig le rnams la ste byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le la sems kyi bzhon pa srog gi rlung stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid ni 'dzin pa'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //🔽rnam pa bcu ni sngar gsungs zin to zhes pa ni 'dzin pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems la rang gi dang gis du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu so sor snang ba sngon ma can rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mthong ba gzugs brnyan
analyzed: rim pas rlung rnams med pa la thig le rnams la ste byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le la sems kyi bzhon pa srog gi rlung stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid ni 'dzin pa'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro // rnam pa bcu ni sngar gsungs zin to zhes pa ni 'dzin pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems la rang gi dang gis du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu so sor snang ba sngon ma can rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mthong ba gzugs brnyan
translated: The wind-energies gradually disappear into the drops, and the life-force wind, which is the mount of the mind, becomes of one taste with emptiness in the drop of bodhicitta. This is holding.🔽 The ten aspects have been mentioned before means that the ten aspects of the signs such as smoke, which appear to the mind that has entered into holding, are preceded by the seeing of the deities of the perfect mandala in the form of reflections.

original: gyi rnam pa can rtog pa med pa dang / de las 'od zer du ma spro ba dang / de nas khams gsum du lha'i 'khor lo spro ba sngon ma can bsam pa la 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bcu ni rjes su dran pa'o zhes smras pa'o //
analyzed: gyi rnam pa can rtog pa med pa dang / de las 'od zer du ma spro ba dang / de nas khams gsum du lha'i 'khor lo spro ba sngon ma can bsam pa la 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bcu ni rjes su dran pa'o zhes smras pa'o //
translated: The ten states of desire, which are preceded by the emission of many light rays from that and the emission of the wheel of deities into the three realms, are called recollection.

original: srog la sogs pa rnams med pa las zhes pa gtum mo 'bar bas yang dag par gsal bar byas pa nyid kyis rdo rje nor bu'i mgo bo'i rtse mor rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems ma nyams pa ste /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa rnams med pa las zhes pa gtum mo 'bar bas yang dag par gsal bar byas pa nyid kyis rdo rje nor bu'i mgo bo'i rtse mor rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems ma nyams pa ste /
translated: flaming caṇḍālī at the tip of the vajra jewel.🔽Then, the twenty-one thousand🔽respiratory movements in excess of the six hundred in each of the six cakras🔽are arrested. The result of this is the yoga of nonconceptuality, the nature

original: de nas rim gyi 'khor lo drug rnams su dbugs brgya phag drug gis lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'gags pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rnal 'byor mi @317b 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin zung 'jug gi bdag nyid kyi ye
analyzed: de nas rim gyi 'khor lo drug rnams su dbugs brgya phag drug gis lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'gags pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rnal 'byor mi @317b 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin zung 'jug gi bdag nyid kyi ye
translated: of unchanging bliss, the essence of Mahāvajradhara, the embodiment of

original: shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo ni ting nge 'dzin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo ni ting nge 'dzin zhes pa'o //
translated: unity, the nature of gnosis. This is called “samādhi.”🔽The result of prāṇāyāma and so forth is the characteristic of the praise

original: so sor sdud pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni yan lag drug gi rjes su bsngags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni yan lag drug gi rjes su bsngags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: of the six limbs.

original: byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni skye ba dang byang chub pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa rab tu mi 'jug pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni skye ba dang byang chub pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa rab tu mi 'jug pa'i phyir te /
translated: One becomes a bodhisattva means that one does not enter into birth, enlightenment, the wheel of the Dharma, and so on.

original: de rab tu 'jug pas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su tha snyad bya ba bsten par 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de rab tu 'jug pas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su tha snyad bya ba bsten par 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is only by entering into those that one becomes a buddha, and one is then said to attend to the perfection of the buddha-field.

original: dbang bcu la sogs pa zhes pa tshe dang / las dang mos pa dang / sems dang / yo byad dang / smon lam dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / skye ba dang / ye shes dang / chos la dbang ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bcu la sogs pa zhes pa tshe dang / las dang mos pa dang / sems dang / yo byad dang / smon lam dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / skye ba dang / ye shes dang / chos la dbang ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ten powers, and so on, are the powers over life, action, faith, mind, requisites, prayer, miracles, rebirth, gnosis, and the Dharma.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems ni byed pa po'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems ni byed pa po'o //
translated: The mind of subject and object is the agent.

original: gzhan du yang rjes su bsngags pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan du yang rjes su bsngags pa gsungs pa /
translated: Praise is also stated elsewhere:

original: so sor sdud pas snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: so sor sdud pas snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: By means of the yoga of withdrawal,

original: sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
analyzed: sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
translated: one is blessed by all the mantras.

original: bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug pas //
analyzed: bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug pas //
translated: By means of the meditative concentration of the gnosis of the meditative absorptions,

original: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one attains the five superknowledges.

original: srog gi rtsol bas nges par ni //
analyzed: srog gi rtsol bas nges par ni //
translated: By the life-force and exertion,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs //
translated: the bodhisattvas see.

original: rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni //
translated: By the power of constant retention,🔽the vajra-mind enters into union,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'jug / rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba las //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'jug / rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba las //
translated: and from the union of the recollection,

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor skye bar 'gyur //
translated: the mandala of light is born.

original: ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni //
translated: By the mere mastery of meditative concentration,

original: sgrib pa med pa ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa ldan par 'gyur //
translated: one becomes endowed with the unobscured.

original: zhes pa'o // dman pa nyid kyis g-yon pa dang g-yas par 'bab pa bar mchad pa'i phyir srog ma spyi pa nyid kyis so //🔽n'a da goms pa las ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba goms pa las so //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // dman pa nyid kyis g-yon pa dang g-yas par 'bab pa bar mchad pa'i phyir srog ma spyi pa nyid kyis so // n'a da goms pa las ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba goms pa las so //
translated: By the inferior, it flows to the left and right, because the life-force is not unified.

original: stobs kyis te h'um yig gi n'a das shes rab kyi chu skyes dang rdo rje nor bur byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'gog pa las te /
analyzed: stobs kyis te h'um yig gi n'a das shes rab kyi chu skyes dang rdo rje nor bur byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'gog pa las te /
translated: By the power of the nāda of the hūṃ syllable, the bindu of bodhicitta is blocked in the lotus of the wisdom and the vajra jewel.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i 'dod ma mchog rjes su chags pa can gyi kakkola ru cho ga bzhin du bo la bcug nas g-yo ba med pa nyid kyis dal bso ste /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i 'dod ma mchog rjes su chags pa can gyi kakkola ru cho ga bzhin du bo la bcug nas g-yo ba med pa nyid kyis dal bso ste /
translated: Having inserted the vajra into the lotus of the consort who is passionate and desirous as explained, one should slowly draw it out due to immobility.

original: de'i ze 'bru'i sgo ru rdo rje nor bu btsir nas shin tu dga' ba'i ro yis skad cig g-yo ba med par bya'o //🔽de nas de dag gis 'gyur ba'i skabs byung na h'um yig brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin @318a * //
analyzed: de'i ze 'bru'i sgo ru rdo rje nor bu btsir nas shin tu dga' ba'i ro yis skad cig g-yo ba med par bya'o // de nas de dag gis 'gyur ba'i skabs byung na h'um yig brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin @318a * //
translated: Having squeezed the jewel of the vajra into the pistil of the lotus, one should be immobile for an instant due to the taste of supreme joy.🔽Then, when the opportunity for change arises, having recited the syllable hūṃ beforehand, one should stop the bindu of bodhicitta through the kindness of the guru’s feet,

original: gyis byas pa la mngon du phyogs shing zhi ba lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyams su myong bas byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: gyis byas pa la mngon du phyogs shing zhi ba lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyams su myong bas byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'gog pa ste /
translated: facing the practice, and experiencing the coemergent joy of peace.

original: de nas 'gyur ba med pa'i skad cig 'thob pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nas 'gyur ba med pa'i skad cig 'thob pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Then, one attains the instant of immutability.

original: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid du 'brel pa can du gang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid du 'brel pa can du gang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In this very glorious Kālacakra, “the one who is related” and so on.

original: nus ma ni srog gi nus pa'o //
analyzed: nus ma ni srog gi nus pa'o //
translated: The one with power is the power of life.

original: gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro ste /
translated: One goes to the place of another.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i gnas su'o //🔽bcu gnyis mtha' zhes pa sna bug g-yon pa nam mkha' la sogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug par sor bcu drug la sogs par sor bcu gnyis kyi mthar thug par ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i gnas su'o // bcu gnyis mtha' zhes pa sna bug g-yon pa nam mkha' la sogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug par sor bcu drug la sogs par sor bcu gnyis kyi mthar thug par ro //
translated: In the state of non-objectification.🔽The twelve-finger-breadth limit is from the left nostril to the end of the earth maṇḍala in space, sixteen finger-breadths, and so on, up to twelve finger-breadths.

original: cha'i mtha' zhes pa sna bug g-yas par sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa sor bcu gnyis la sogs pa sor bcu drug gi bar du'o //
analyzed: cha'i mtha' zhes pa sna bug g-yas par sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa sor bcu gnyis la sogs pa sor bcu drug gi bar du'o //
translated: The half limit is from the right nostril to the end of the earth maṇḍala in space, twelve finger-breadths, and so on, up to sixteen finger-breadths.

original: h'um yig gi brjod pas srog dang thur sel gyi rlung dag sbyor ba las de lte bar bkag nas srog gi nus pa de nyid ni glog gi me dang mtshungs shing glog gi me dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: h'um yig gi brjod pas srog dang thur sel gyi rlung dag sbyor ba las de lte bar bkag nas srog gi nus pa de nyid ni glog gi me dang mtshungs shing glog gi me dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Through the utterance of the syllable hūṃ, the vāyu of life and the downward-clearing vāyu unite. Having blocked the navel, the power of the life [vāyu] is like the fire of lightning and resembles the fire of lightning.

original: bskyod pa ni bsgul ba'o //
analyzed: bskyod pa ni bsgul ba'o //
translated: Shaking is moving.

original: khab bzhin ni khab dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: khab bzhin ni khab dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Like a needle is like a needle.

original: thur du sel ba zhes pa 'gro ste rab tu 'jug go //
analyzed: thur du sel ba zhes pa 'gro ste rab tu 'jug go //
translated: The downward-clearing [vāyu] moves and enters.

original: pha rol gyi grong du ste lus gzhan du'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi grong du ste lus gzhan du'o //
translated: In the city of the other is in another body.

original: ci ste 'di tsam gyis kyang gzhan gyi grong du 'jug pa ma yin na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste 'di tsam gyis kyang gzhan gyi grong du 'jug pa ma yin na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one does not enter another's town even with this much, what then?

original: de'i tshe 'di ltar bya'o zhes gsungs pa /🔽'di ltar te rim pa 'di yis rdo rje rab tu sad pa las te mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes rab tu sad pa las so //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ltar bya'o zhes gsungs pa / 'di ltar te rim pa 'di yis rdo rje rab tu sad pa las te mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes rab tu sad pa las so //
translated: Then one should do it this way, he says.

original: yid la zhes pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems gcig tu 'dres par gyur ba'i sems la'o //
analyzed: yid la zhes pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems gcig tu 'dres par gyur ba'i sems la'o //
translated: In this way, by this process, from the arousal of the vajra from the arousal of the supreme bliss gnosis, in the mind in the mind that has become a unity of the grasped and grasper,

original: yul dang bcas pa ni dbang po dang yul gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nus pa de'o //
analyzed: yul dang bcas pa ni dbang po dang yul gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nus pa de'o //
translated: with the object with the power that has become a unity of the sense organ and the object,

original: mkha' la spyod pa nyid ni 'og min gyi sa'i mthar thug pa la dbang byed pa'i bdag po nyid du 'gro'o //
analyzed: mkha' la spyod pa nyid ni 'og min gyi sa'i mthar thug pa la dbang byed pa'i bdag po nyid du 'gro'o //
translated: one goes to the state of space-travel to the state of mastery of the end of the Akaniṣṭha level.

original: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Not only that, he says,

original: mngon shes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mngon shes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: superknowledge, etc.

original: rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //🔽sna tshogs yul du yang 'gyur te phyag @318b rgya chen mor shes rab gyi  chags pas rnam par rtog pa med pa'i gtum mo 'bar bas 'gyur med gsum gyi rnal 'byor zhes pa gsang bar son pa sems kyi thig le 'gags pa dang / lte bar son pa ngag gi thig le 'gags pa dang //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon shes lnga'i rang bzhin no // sna tshogs yul du yang 'gyur te phyag @318b rgya chen mor shes rab gyi  chags pas rnam par rtog pa med pa'i gtum mo 'bar bas 'gyur med gsum gyi rnal 'byor zhes pa gsang bar son pa sems kyi thig le 'gags pa dang / lte bar son pa ngag gi thig le 'gags pa dang //
translated: The nature of the five superknowledges is the nature of the divine eye, the divine ear, the knowledge of the thoughts of others, and the recollection of previous states.🔽The object is various, and it is the yoga of the three immovables, which is said to be the blazing of the inner fire without discursive thought through the passion of wisdom in the great seal.

original: snying gar son pa lus kyi thig le 'gags pa zhes pa'o ;
analyzed: snying gar son pa lus kyi thig le 'gags pa zhes pa'o ;
translated: The yoga of pristine consciousness is the yoga of the three immovables, which is said to be the cessation of the mind drop that has entered the secret place, the cessation of the speech drop that has entered the navel, and the cessation of the body drop that has entered the heart.

original: / bde ba ma nyams pas rdo rje'i sgor thig le'i tshogs ma 'phos pas ye shes kyi thig le 'gags pas ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: / bde ba ma nyams pas rdo rje'i sgor thig le'i tshogs ma 'phos pas ye shes kyi thig le 'gags pas ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga of the three immovables is the yoga of the three immovables, which is said to be the cessation of the pristine consciousness drop that has not moved from the assembly of the drops at the vajra door through the unimpaired bliss.

original: zung gi rlung gis ngag 'gags pa 'di ni zhes pa'i mthar thug pas sa la spyod pa'i dngos grub gsal bar mdzad cing mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhes pa'i mthar thug pas mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub rtogs par mdzad la /
analyzed: zung gi rlung gis ngag 'gags pa 'di ni zhes pa'i mthar thug pas sa la spyod pa'i dngos grub gsal bar mdzad cing mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhes pa'i mthar thug pas mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub rtogs par mdzad la /
translated: The power of the wind of the pair, up to “this is the cessation of speech,” makes clear the power of movement on the earth, and up to “it becomes movement in the sky,” makes clear the power of movement in the sky.

original: sna tshogs yum zhes pa'i bar gyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub gsal bar mdzad do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs yum zhes pa'i bar gyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub gsal bar mdzad do zhes pa'o //
translated: Up to “the mother of variety,” makes clear the power of the great seal.

original: phyag rgya zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen mo'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen mo'o //
translated: The “seal” is the great seal.

original: sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa ni shin tu dang ba'i me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa ni shin tu dang ba'i me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
translated: “Conforming to illusion” is like a reflection in a very clear mirror.

original: yid dang nam mkha' la yang ni sems med pa'i sems la'o //
analyzed: yid dang nam mkha' la yang ni sems med pa'i sems la'o //
translated: “In the mind and in the sky” is in the mindless mind.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: me long la ni gzugs bzhin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: me long la ni gzugs bzhin zhes pa ste /
translated: “Like a form in a mirror.”

original: gzugs bzhin ni gzugs dang 'dra bar 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs bzhin ni gzugs dang 'dra bar 'phro ba'o //
translated: “Like a form” is the radiation like a form.

original: phyi dang lus la dbyer med pa yul dang dbang po dag gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyi dang lus la dbyer med pa yul dang dbang po dag gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Inseparable from the external and the body” is the merging of the object and the sense faculty into one.

original: chos can dang tha dad par chos snang ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir yul dang rnam par bral ba'o //
analyzed: chos can dang tha dad par chos snang ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir yul dang rnam par bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from objects and aspects because it is the nature of the appearance of phenomena, which is different from the phenomenal basis.

original: du ma'i ngo bo 'gro ba'i sems la 'khyud bar byed de de gcig pu spang ngo //
analyzed: du ma'i ngo bo 'gro ba'i sems la 'khyud bar byed de de gcig pu spang ngo //
translated: It is the nature of multiplicity, which embraces the mind of beings, and it is to be abandoned as being one.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sems kyi rang bzhin te sems med pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sems kyi rang bzhin te sems med pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the nature of mind, the nature of mind that is without mind.

original: sems kyi ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag gcig tu 'dres par gyur ba'i snang ba tsam rang gi lus la snang brnyan gyi ngo bo mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sems kyi ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag gcig tu 'dres par gyur ba'i snang ba tsam rang gi lus la snang brnyan gyi ngo bo mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: It is the appearance of mind, the mere appearance of the object and subject merged into one, the supreme seal, the nature of the reflection in one’s own body.

original: rang gi yid la ste rnam pa thams cad pa rnam pa med pa'i ngo bo las skyes pa ste byung ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi yid la ste rnam pa thams cad pa rnam pa med pa'i ngo bo las skyes pa ste byung ba'o //
translated: It is born from one’s own mind, born from the nature that is all aspects and without aspects.

original: de ni ye shes me lce 'bar ba ste ye shes kyi gtum mo 'bar ba 'phel ba'o ;
analyzed: de ni ye shes me lce 'bar ba ste ye shes kyi gtum mo 'bar ba 'phel ba'o ;
translated: It is the blazing flame of wisdom, the blazing and increasing of the candālī of wisdom.

original: / yul dang bcas pa ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i bdud tshogs te rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyi dra ba'o //
analyzed: / yul dang bcas pa ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i bdud tshogs te rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyi dra ba'o //
translated: along with the objects, along with the wheel of aggregates, elements, and sense bases, the host of māras, the net of the mind of discursive thought.

original: gsungs pa yang bdud ni rang gi sems te bdud gzhan yod pa ma yin zhes so //🔽ster zhing stsol te zhi ba'i bde ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i @319a * //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang bdud ni rang gi sems te bdud gzhan yod pa ma yin zhes so // ster zhing stsol te zhi ba'i bde ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i @319a * //
translated: It is also said, “Māra is one’s own mind; there is no other māra.”

original: dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: The bliss of peace is the bliss of connate joy.

original: lo'i sbyor ba las te lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyi dus kyi 'khor lo yis so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lo'i sbyor ba las te lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyi dus kyi 'khor lo yis so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The yoga of the year is the Kālacakra of three years and three half months.

original: shes rab dang ni ye shes zhes pa grangs ji lta ba bzhin te /
analyzed: shes rab dang ni ye shes zhes pa grangs ji lta ba bzhin te /
translated: Wisdom and gnosis are in order.

original: shes rab ni chos thams cad stod pa nyid du rtogs pa ste de ni sems so //
analyzed: shes rab ni chos thams cad stod pa nyid du rtogs pa ste de ni sems so //
translated: Wisdom is the realization of all phenomena as emptiness; that is the mind.

original: de'i du ba la sogs pa'i kun nas mthong ba'i snang ba ni gzung bya'i sems te de kho na'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i du ba la sogs pa'i kun nas mthong ba'i snang ba ni gzung bya'i sems te de kho na'i ye shes so //
translated: The appearance of smoke and so on that is seen from that is the apprehending mind; that is gnosis.

original: 'dis ni ji ltar me long la gzugs brnyan rang gis te bdag nyid kyi mig gis gzung bar bya ba de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi sems kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad pa'i sems rtag tu mthong ba'o zhes pa'i don
analyzed: 'dis ni ji ltar me long la gzugs brnyan rang gis te bdag nyid kyi mig gis gzung bar bya ba de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi sems kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad pa'i sems rtag tu mthong ba'o zhes pa'i don
translated: This means that just as a reflection is apprehended by the eye, by itself, by one’s own eye, in the same way, the mind, whose nature is emptiness, always sees the mind, whose nature is emptiness, in all aspects.

original: to // gzung ba'i sems du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'di la 'dzin pa'i sems stong pa nyid zhugs shing gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: to // gzung ba'i sems du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'di la 'dzin pa'i sems stong pa nyid zhugs shing gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o //
translated: The apprehending mind, which has the character of smoke, etc., is penetrated by the emptiness of the apprehending mind and becomes one with it.

original: rjes su dran pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rjes su dran pa gsungs pa /
translated: The recollection is stated:

original: dri med ces pa'o //
analyzed: dri med ces pa'o //
translated: “stainless,”

original: byis pa dang dar la bab pa dang g-yo ba rnams kyi zhes pa thabs kyi gyur ba'i bde ba rnam pa gnyis te byis pa dar la bab pa'o //
analyzed: byis pa dang dar la bab pa dang g-yo ba rnams kyi zhes pa thabs kyi gyur ba'i bde ba rnam pa gnyis te byis pa dar la bab pa'o //
translated: “of the childish, the youthful, and the aged,” refers to the two kinds of bliss that are the means: the bliss of the childish and the youthful.

original: shes rab kyi g-yo ba ni bde ba rgan po'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi g-yo ba ni bde ba rgan po'o //
translated: The aged bliss is the movement of wisdom.

original: de rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: Of those, the highest is supramundane.

original: shes rab dang thabs de dag gang gi tshe g-yo ba med par 'gyur ba de zhi ba ste mchog gi phyag rgya las byung ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs de dag gang gi tshe g-yo ba med par 'gyur ba de zhi ba ste mchog gi phyag rgya las byung ba zhes pa'o //
translated: When those wisdoms and methods become unmoving, that is peace, which is the supreme seal.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Vajra-holder means the emanation body of the Vajra-holder.

original: de ni rang gi sems 'di'i snang ba la ste /
analyzed: de ni rang gi sems 'di'i snang ba la ste /
translated: That is to be introduced into the appearance of one’s own mind.

original: me long gi gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi snang ba la gzhug pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: me long gi gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi snang ba la gzhug pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: The appearance of the mind, which is like a reflection in a mirror, is to be introduced.

original: nam mkhar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkhar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “ In the sky” and so forth.

original: mtshan mo zhes pa mun pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo zhes pa mun pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: “ Night” indicates darkness.

original: nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems ni gang rnams kyi sems nam mkha' la kun nas chags pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems ni gang rnams kyi sems nam mkha' la kun nas chags pa ste /
translated: Those whose minds are attached to the sky are those whose minds are attached to the sky.

original: de dang ro mnyam par gyur pa yin pa de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de dang ro mnyam par gyur pa yin pa de rnams kyis so //
translated: Those who have become of the same taste as that.

original: rdo rje'i lam du zhugs pas ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir son pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lam du zhugs pas ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir son pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “ Having entered the vajra path” means that the life-force has entered the avadhūti.

original: nam mkha' sprin med pa'i mtshan ma ni gzhi can gyi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' sprin med pa'i mtshan ma ni gzhi can gyi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
translated: The sign of the cloudless sky is the nature of the basis.

original: de ltar gzugs snang ba las zhes pa me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu rnyog pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs so sor snang ba las so //
analyzed: de ltar gzugs snang ba las zhes pa me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu rnyog pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs so sor snang ba las so //
translated: Thus, from the appearance of form, like a reflection in a mirror, the unobstructed appearance of form is unclouded.

original: sgra snang ba las zhes pas mgrin pa dang rkan la sogs pa'i rtsol ba las ma skyes pa'i bde ba chen po rol pa gzhom @319b du med pa'i skra tsam nyams su myong ba las so //
analyzed: sgra snang ba las zhes pas mgrin pa dang rkan la sogs pa'i rtsol ba las ma skyes pa'i bde ba chen po rol pa gzhom @319b du med pa'i skra tsam nyams su myong ba las so //
translated: From the appearance of sound, the experience of the indestructible drop of the great bliss that is not born from the effort of the throat, palate, and so on.

original: 'di tsam gyis ni tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gnyis gsal bar byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis ni tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gnyis gsal bar byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this much, this verse clarifies the two bodies of the glorious Bhagavān Vajradhara.

original: nam mkha' zhes pa la rengs pa'i mig gis mig g-yo ba med pas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes pa la rengs pa'i mig gis mig g-yo ba med pas so //
translated: In the sky, with unblinking eyes, because the eyes are unmoving.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa med pa'i phyir te rang gi sems las tha dad pa'i gzhan gyi sems shes par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa med pa'i phyir te rang gi sems las tha dad pa'i gzhan gyi sems shes par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no knowledge of the mind of another, because there is no knowledge of the mind of another that is different from one’s own mind.

original: gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang //
translated: It is also said:

original: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i //
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i //
translated: What is seen here as an object of knowledge,

original: shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba //
analyzed: shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba //
translated: unborn and unceasing,

original: de ni rang sems gzhan gyi min //
analyzed: de ni rang sems gzhan gyi min //
translated: is one’s own mind, not another.

original: phyi yi shes bya rnam 'byed phyir //🔽de phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la ;
analyzed: phyi yi shes bya rnam 'byed phyir // de phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la ;
translated: In order to distinguish external objects of knowledge,

original: /'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin //
analyzed: /'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin //
translated: therefore, I cannot seal myself anywhere.

original: ral gri chen pos bdag nyid la //
analyzed: ral gri chen pos bdag nyid la //
translated: With a great sword,

original: bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci //
analyzed: bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci //
translated: do I cut myself with my own teeth?

original: mo gsham bu mo dang 'grogs pas //
analyzed: mo gsham bu mo dang 'grogs pas //
translated: By associating with the daughter of a barren woman,

original: rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur ltar //
analyzed: rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur ltar //
translated: I will have bliss in a dream.

original: nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni //
translated: The reflection that arises from space,

original: bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no //
analyzed: bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no //
translated: by relying on it, so am I.

original: zhes so // tshigs su bcad pa 'dis chos kyi sku'i sgrub par byed pa gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes so // tshigs su bcad pa 'dis chos kyi sku'i sgrub par byed pa gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: This verse states the proof of the Dharma Body.

original: sa'i rnam pa zhes pa la sogs pa gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: sa'i rnam pa zhes pa la sogs pa gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: The characteristic of form is said to be the aspect of earth, etc.

original: 'dir stong pa nyid kyi so sor snang ba rdzas ma yin pa sa la sogs pa la mthong ste sra ba me yin no //
analyzed: 'dir stong pa nyid kyi so sor snang ba rdzas ma yin pa sa la sogs pa la mthong ste sra ba me yin no //
translated: Here, the appearance of emptiness is seen in earth, etc., which are not substantial, as solidity is in fire.

original: zhu ba'i rnam pa can smig rgyu'i chu lta bu ni chu ma yin te gsher pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhu ba'i rnam pa can smig rgyu'i chu lta bu ni chu ma yin te gsher pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The form of melting, like the water of a mirage, is not water, because it lacks fluidity.

original: me'i rnam pa ni de bzhin du me min te gang gi phyir sreg par byed pa med pas so //
analyzed: me'i rnam pa ni de bzhin du me min te gang gi phyir sreg par byed pa med pas so //
translated: The form of fire is not fire, because it lacks the function of burning.

original: g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni rdzas med pa nyid kyi phyir gang g-yo ba med pa de ni rlung ma yin no //
analyzed: g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni rdzas med pa nyid kyi phyir gang g-yo ba med pa de ni rlung ma yin no //
translated: The body of wind, which is movement, is not wind, because it lacks movement, due to its lack of substance.

original: rdzas med pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: rdzas med pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: The form of emptiness is not emptiness, because it lacks substance.

original: de yin yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yin yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: But it is to be seen.

original: sgyu ma'i grong khyer bzhin du dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan yang rdzas med pa'i phyir kha dog ma yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i grong khyer bzhin du dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan yang rdzas med pa'i phyir kha dog ma yin no //
translated: Like an illusory city, it has the color of white, etc., but it is not color, because it lacks substance.

original: rnam pa thams cad pa yin yang dus thams cad du byis pa rnams kyis blta bya min no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa yin yang dus thams cad du byis pa rnams kyis blta bya min no //
translated: Although it is all-encompassing, it is not to be seen by the childish at all times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las te g-yon ba dang g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog rab tu rgyu ba las so zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las te g-yon ba dang g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog rab tu rgyu ba las so zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: It is due to the power of the māra of the afflictions, from the life-force flowing through the left and right channels.

original: da ni dkyil 'khor lnga zad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor lnga zad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the exhaustion of the five maṇḍalas is stated.

original: sa zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: sa zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: The “earth” and so on.

original: 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa mig mi 'dzums par gyur cing /🔽khro bo'i lta bas stong pa la sems bkod pa de'i tshe g-yon nam @320a * //
analyzed: 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa mig mi 'dzums par gyur cing / khro bo'i lta bas stong pa la sems bkod pa de'i tshe g-yon nam @320a * //
translated: Here, when the yogi/nī becomes one who does not close the eyes,

original: g-yas su sa zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste gang tshe g-yas su rab tu 'bab pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa sgom par byed na de'i tshe rnam pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: g-yas su sa zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste gang tshe g-yas su rab tu 'bab pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa sgom par byed na de'i tshe rnam pa 'di lta ste /
translated: and the mind is placed in emptiness by the wrathful gaze, at that time, to the left or right, the “earth” is indicated. When the time of the descent to the right, if the yogi/nī meditates, then at that time, in this way,

original: g-yon pa'i rtsa la rab tu 'bab pa'i dus su ni ma yin te /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rtsa la rab tu 'bab pa'i dus su ni ma yin te /
translated: not on the time of the descent to the left,

original: 'on kyang nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa las so //
analyzed: 'on kyang nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa las so //
translated: but rather from the stage of the maṇḍala of space and so on.

original: des na g-yon nam g-yas su srog gi dkyil 'khor gang 'bab pa de'i chos can nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor de nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: des na g-yon nam g-yas su srog gi dkyil 'khor gang 'bab pa de'i chos can nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor de nyid gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, the maṇḍala that is the dharma of the descent of the life-force to the left or right is stated.

original: des na g-yas pa'i rtsa la sa'i dkyil 'khor las srog chu'i dkyil 'khor la 'gro ste /
analyzed: des na g-yas pa'i rtsa la sa'i dkyil 'khor las srog chu'i dkyil 'khor la 'gro ste /
translated: Thus, on the right channel, the life-force moves from the maṇḍala of earth to the maṇḍala of water.

original: de bzhin du ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du'o //
translated: Likewise, up to the maṇḍala of gnosis.

original: rtsa g-yon pa la nam mkha' la sogs pas 'gro'o //
analyzed: rtsa g-yon pa la nam mkha' la sogs pas 'gro'o //
translated: In the left channel, one moves with space, and so on.

original: de bzhin du stong pa nges par du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du stong pa nges par du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, emptiness becomes the ten signs, such as the mirage, and so on, and the sign becomes the form of everything.

original: gzugs las mi 'gyur bde bar 'gyur zhing de nyid ye shes te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs las mi 'gyur bde bar 'gyur zhing de nyid ye shes te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: From form, there is unchanging bliss, and that is gnosis, the nature of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ye shes las rdzu 'phrul te nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa dang dngos grub khams gsum pa'i dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ye shes las rdzu 'phrul te nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa dang dngos grub khams gsum pa'i dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: From gnosis, there is magic, such as moving through space, and so on, and there is the power of the lord of the three worlds.

original: mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o zhes pa lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o zhes pa lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: For people, the lords of humans, in this very life.

original: da ni rnal 'byor nye bar bsdu ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor nye bar bsdu ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the yoga should be summarized.

original: dbu mar srog ni zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: dbu mar srog ni zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: The summary is stated in the lines beginning “In the central nāḍī, the prāṇa,” and so on.

original: 'dir dang po'i rnal 'byor pas dbu mar srog rab tu 'jug par bya ste gang gis mtshan ma mthong bar byed pa aa wa dh'u t'ir ro //
analyzed: 'dir dang po'i rnal 'byor pas dbu mar srog rab tu 'jug par bya ste gang gis mtshan ma mthong bar byed pa aa wa dh'u t'ir ro //
translated: Here, the beginner yogi should enter the life-force into the central [channel], by which he will see the signs in the avadhūtī.

original: de ltar dpal ldan bla ma'i ste sangs rgyas kyi sku rdo rje ste zhal gcig tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dpal ldan bla ma'i ste sangs rgyas kyi sku rdo rje ste zhal gcig tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the glorious guru, the Buddha's body vajra, should be described as having one face.

original: de nas nyi ma dang bcas te g-yas pa'i bgrod pa dang lhan cig tu ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g-yon pa'i rtsa'i srog bcing ba'o zhes pa nges pa ste /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma dang bcas te g-yas pa'i bgrod pa dang lhan cig tu ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g-yon pa'i rtsa'i srog bcing ba'o zhes pa nges pa ste /
translated: Then, together with the sun, the life-force of the right channel, along with the path of the rabbit, the life-force of the left channel, is bound. This is the rule.

original: srog rtsol gnyis ni gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: srog rtsol gnyis ni gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: The two life-force controls are the speech vajra.

original: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems te gzugs la rjes su chags pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang gsum pa thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems te gzugs la rjes su chags pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang gsum pa thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: The mind that goes to the consort, the bodhicitta that is attached to form, and the vajra that is raised by abiding in supreme bliss are the third, the mind vajra.

original: ci sta gzugs kyi sgo nas kun dga'i bde bar ma gyur na de'i tshe padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am zhes pa dal bu rnams kyis bya'o //
analyzed: ci sta gzugs kyi sgo nas kun dga'i bde bar ma gyur na de'i tshe padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am zhes pa dal bu rnams kyis bya'o //
translated: If, however, there is no bliss through the form, then at that time one should slowly utter the sound of the vajra in the lotus.

original: ci ste bud med ma rnyed na de'i tshe rang gi lag pa'i padmas gsor bar bya ste /
analyzed: ci ste bud med ma rnyed na de'i tshe rang gi lag pa'i padmas gsor bar bya ste /
translated: If one does not find a woman, then at that time one should rub with one's own lotus hand.

original: bde ba 'phel ba'i rgyu ru yin gyi ltung pa'i @320b rgyur ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba 'phel ba'i rgyu ru yin gyi ltung pa'i @320b rgyur ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the cause of increasing bliss, not the cause of downfall.

original: de ltar sa bon gtong pa min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar sa bon gtong pa min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog tu 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, that bliss which is not emitted, the seed, becomes the snatcher of the fear of death.🔽This is the face of the glorious guru, Jnanavajra.

original: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal bzhi pa ye shes rdo rje 'di'o zhes pa rnal 'byor goms par byed pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal bzhi pa ye shes rdo rje 'di'o zhes pa rnal 'byor goms par byed pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the certainty of the practice of yoga.

original: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis par te gang las dbang mdor bstan pa phyung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis par te gang las dbang mdor bstan pa phyung ba'o //
translated: In the Twelve Thousand, the Supreme Original Buddha, from which the Abhisamayalankara was extracted,

original: 'di nyid kyi ni zhes pa nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bud shing ma lus pa'i me thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis sgrub byed de gsal bar 'gyur bar du ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi ni zhes pa nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bud shing ma lus pa'i me thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis sgrub byed de gsal bar 'gyur bar du ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
translated: The yogi/nī should do this with smoke and so forth, since the fire of the fuel of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience is established by the wisdom of omniscience.

original: cir gyur pa rnams kyis she na /
analyzed: cir gyur pa rnams kyis she na /
translated: With what?

original: de rnams kyi ste rtsa ba'i rgyud dang nyung du'i rgyud dang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nges pa'i don gyi mdo ru rab tu grags pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ste rtsa ba'i rgyud dang nyung du'i rgyud dang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nges pa'i don gyi mdo ru rab tu grags pa rnams kyis so //
translated: With those, the root tantra, the short tantra, and the sūtras of definitive meaning, such as the noble Perfection of Wisdom, that are well known.

original: glo bur du stong pa la so sor snang ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan rnams kyis so //
analyzed: glo bur du stong pa la so sor snang ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan rnams kyis so //
translated: With reflections, because they appear as empty by nature.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad zhi ba'i phyir bsam pa ma yin pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad zhi ba'i phyir bsam pa ma yin pa rnams kyis so //
translated: With the unthought, because all conceptuality is pacified.

original: de kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu'i snga ltas nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu'i snga ltas nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma rnams kyis so //
translated: With signs, because they are the signs of the fruit of reality.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi blo ni shes rab ste de'i gzugs brnyan rnal 'byor pa la mngon sum du snang ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi blo ni shes rab ste de'i gzugs brnyan rnal 'byor pa la mngon sum du snang ba rnams kyis so //
translated: The yogi/nī directly perceives the reflections of that.

original: phyi dang nang gi dri mas ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir mkha' mnyam rnams kyis so //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi dri mas ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir mkha' mnyam rnams kyis so //
translated: Since it is not tainted by external and internal stains, it is equal to space.

original: yod ces pa la sogs pa rnams yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i skyon gyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnyog pas mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par 'das pa'o //
analyzed: yod ces pa la sogs pa rnams yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i skyon gyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnyog pas mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par 'das pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from the turbidity of conceptual thoughts of existence, non-existence, and so on, it is beyond.

original: rnam par rnal 'byor pas rang rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi yid ches par byed pa'i don rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rnam par rnal 'byor pas rang rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi yid ches par byed pa'i don rnams kyis so //
translated: Since it is to be known by the yogi/nī through self-awareness, it is the object of one's own mind's confidence.

original: rnam pa thams cad du ma byas pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ma byas pa /
translated: It is not made in any way.

original: rmad du byung ba rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams kun nas yongs su dro bas so //
analyzed: rmad du byung ba rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams kun nas yongs su dro bas so //
translated: Since it is a marvel, the nature of the absence of intrinsic nature, it is completely warmed by the assembly of atoms.

original: du ba zhes pa la sogs pa la phyi dang nang thams cad du khyab pa du ba'i rnam pa can stong pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: du ba zhes pa la sogs pa la phyi dang nang thams cad du khyab pa du ba'i rnam pa can stong pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: The aspect of smoke and so forth pervades all the outside and inside, and has the aspect of emptiness.

original: 'di yang sprin lta bur snang ba'i bar ma chod du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di yang sprin lta bur snang ba'i bar ma chod du 'byung ngo //
translated: This also arises uninterruptedly, appearing like a cloud.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: dang po sprin dang 'dra bar snang //
analyzed: dang po sprin dang 'dra bar snang //
translated: First it appears like a cloud.

original: gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o //
translated: Second, it is like smoke.

original: zhes so // chu g-yo ba'i rnam pa ni smig rgyu'o //
analyzed: zhes so // chu g-yo ba'i rnam pa ni smig rgyu'o //
translated: The aspect of moving water is a mirage.

original: mkha' snang dang sgron ma'i rnam pa dag ni rab tu grags so //
analyzed: mkha' snang dang sgron ma'i rnam pa dag ni rab tu grags so //
translated: The aspects of a luminous sky and a lamp are well known.

original: @321a * // mtshan ma bzhi po 'di dag ni bug pa med pa'i khang par mun pa las 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir mtshan mo'i rnal 'byor dang nam mkha'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: @321a * // mtshan ma bzhi po 'di dag ni bug pa med pa'i khang par mun pa las 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir mtshan mo'i rnal 'byor dang nam mkha'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: These four signs are the yoga of night and the yoga of space, because they arise from darkness in a house without holes.

original: ji skad du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs par dang po dang gnyis pa bzlog nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs par dang po dang gnyis pa bzlog nas gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said in the Shri Guhyasamaja and so forth, the first and second are reversed and said to be:

original: 'gog pa rdo rje bgrod sems las //
analyzed: 'gog pa rdo rje bgrod sems las //
translated: From the mind that travels the vajra of cessation,

original: mtshan ma rab 'dzin skye 'gyur te //
analyzed: mtshan ma rab 'dzin skye 'gyur te //
translated: the sign is born, apprehending the sign.

original: mtshan ma de ni rnam pa lngar //
analyzed: mtshan ma de ni rnam pa lngar //
translated: That sign is said to be fivefold

original: byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin //
translated: by the Awakened Vajra.

original: dang po smig rgyu'i rnam pa ste //
analyzed: dang po smig rgyu'i rnam pa ste //
translated: The first is the form of a mirage;

original: gnyis pa du ba lta bu yin //
analyzed: gnyis pa du ba lta bu yin //
translated: the second is like smoke.

original: gsum pa mkha' snang rnam pa ste //
analyzed: gsum pa mkha' snang rnam pa ste //
translated: The third is the form of an [upward-]moving firefly;

original: bzhi pa sgron ma 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa sgron ma 'bar ba'o //
translated: the fourth is a blazing lamp.

original: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni ;
analyzed: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni ;
translated: The fifth is always the appearance

original: / sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: / sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: of a cloudless sky.

original: zhes so // de nas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' snang ba sngon ma can me'i rnam pa stongs pa'i snang ba ni 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de nas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' snang ba sngon ma can me'i rnam pa stongs pa'i snang ba ni 'bar ba'o //
translated: Then, the appearance of a cloudless sky, preceded by the appearance of fire, is the appearance of blazing.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba dag ni rab tu grags so //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba dag ni rab tu grags so //
translated: The appearances of the moon and sun are well known.

original: mun can ni sgra gcan gyi snang ba ste ri mo dag pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: mun can ni sgra gcan gyi snang ba ste ri mo dag pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of Rāhu is like a painting, appearing as darkness.
